author: {'steamid': '76561198010197847', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 181, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 181, 'last_played': 1680310054}
review:
Senran Kagura games are all made to be a fun time with classic ecchi anime tropes. However, the type of game is often different, and this one being a rhythm cooking game is a perfect example of the odd ninja series. If you have seen Food Wars, then you can imagine what the completed food scenes look like. As with the rest of the series, ecchi is the main selling point, but the stupid humour is great if that is your thing. 

Recommended for fans of pervy anime, cooking, and rhythm games. It is very much a game of what you see is what you get, but there is beauty in the inappropriate simplicity.

Not recommended for people that want a family game, those that expect innocent fun, or fans of only cooking or rhythm games.

author: {'steamid': '76561198076973478', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 196, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 196, 'last_played': 1709187555}
review:
다이도지, 히바리, 야규, 카츠라기 4명의 스토리를 깼다.
처음에는 생각보다 잘 만들어진 리듬게임이라고 생각해서 재밌게 하긴 했는데, 결국 반복 또 반복이다.
상대에 따라 고정된 노래를 플레이하고, 다른 캐릭터로 진행하다가도 그 상대를 만나면 같은 노래를 한 번 더 연주해야한다.
그리고 아무래도 옛날 게임이다 보니 EV하다가 오니 모델링도 좀 후달린다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198809270491', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 87, 'playtime_forever': 110, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 110, 'last_played': 1709010938}
review:
Food Wars! the game lol. At least probably the closest thing you will get to it on Steam. I like SENRAN KAGURA and I like playing rhythm games from time to time, so I found this to be entertaining for a bit. The downside is that the "story" is really just a 5 round arcade game. If I didn't have to play 5 songs in a row, I may have played this more, maybe a song or two waiting on friends to logon.

I recommend a controller, the menu navigation is weird without it, but the game is playable both ways. Though I see some people have issues with the controller? Mine worked fine.

author: {'steamid': '76561198276634938', 'num_games_owned': 10153, 'num_reviews': 1500, 'playtime_forever': 3023, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3023, 'last_played': 1678760907}
review:
[h1]
郑重警告
该游戏含有以下关键元素
-"擂台比试"
-"发光的料理"
-"爆衣"
-"颅内高潮"
-"败者食尘"
咩错 这就是中华小当家的续作——东瀛二当家...
[/h1]

身为奶子控，第一时间就入手了。之前就有看到过忍乳负重，但不知竟然是个音游。画面相较SV变得更加清晰了，妹子更养眼了，最让我有直观感受的就是妹子们的表情变的更加丰富了，食物做的也挺有食欲的，但画面的长进也只限于此了，内衣场景什么的怎么还是如此粗糙啊，各种马赛克内衣。我这也是第一次接触音游，直接被普通难度给扒了个精光，果断简单难度走起。但既然作为一个音游就20多首曲子？而且大多数都很难听啊！前作SV的BGM很出色，为什么不用呢，非要用难听的角色歌和原创曲。因为玩的简单难度，音符节奏有点简单，跟歌曲节奏好像不是很匹配，不过按着还是挺爽的。
对奶子有执着或者闪乱粉肯定要入的，如果只是一般玩家，等75off吧，毕竟这不是个能玩很长时间的游戏。为了能看到明年EV也登录PC，还是点个赞吧。

author: {'steamid': '76561198798183232', 'num_games_owned': 169, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 1083, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 994, 'last_played': 1710860296}
review: this game is an OK rhythm game. if u like senran kagura and rhythm games its a neat little game to play through. its by no means anything special though, and if you have any moderate experience in other rhythm games then hard mode is the only way this game felt playable (atleast to me but i'm sure itd be the same with anyone else). however, this is a pretty rough port. you have an achievement that is completely wrong, the game having a bit of a seizure if you want to get a standard controller hooked up and working, keyboard inputs are forced no matter what so if you dare to multitask while playing, lets say you send a message to someone, hitting enter is still going to cause something to happen in game even if minimized. that aside its alright for what it is, just a little side budget rhythm game. oh, and i guess the vocal tracks are pretty nice :).

author: {'steamid': '76561198393895951', 'num_games_owned': 1507, 'num_reviews': 1228, 'playtime_forever': 640, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 612, 'last_played': 1702103680}
review:
[h1]游戏的介绍[/h1]
《SENRAN KAGURA Bon Appétit! - Full Course》是款由Meteorise制作的带有料理对决的音乐游戏。在这款游戏中妹子们为了获得秘传忍法从而实现自己的愿望，于是上演了一场料理上的对决，谁能征服半藏大师的胃谁将是最后的胜者！

[h1]游戏的体验[/h1]
本作的玩法主要是音游的双轨道八键位玩法，需要玩家根据从右边出现的符号在飞镖处正确打出，由于我之前音游只玩过传统模式，即只有右边键盘上下左右的，所以这次的设置给我增添了一定的难度，简单难度的话由于符号量不是很大且具有较大的间隔，玩起来比较轻松愉快，但普通和困难就显得有些难度了，比较考验玩家双手的协调性以及识谱的准确性，因为这时符号间距极大缩小，再搭配左右俩边键位的混合着实提升了难度，好几次我都打成了相反的键位，就让连击断了，真的有些小无奈，所以要想挑战这俩种难度，建议多多练习。然后每场对战都是三回合制，但主要决定最终结果的是第三回合，所以就算前俩回合占优也不能掉以轻心，以防被对手反超。要想快速获得优势的话主要还是要打连击，这就比较考验玩家的技术了，没有其他的办法，音游面前人人平等。

接着福利方面本作有俩种，一种是战斗时落入下风的一方，会被半藏大师逐渐爆衣，直到全裸，但全裸时是有圣光的和可爱头像的掩护，若你获得全面胜利，输家会被做成“女体盛”，这时你就可以仔细端详她们，十分美味，只不过重要部位都被遮住了，啥也看不见。第二种就是更衣室中的触摸，点击她们不同的部位，她们会有各种各样的娇羞反馈，同时还会有弹幕的吐槽，其次就是通过来回的滑动来提升连击数，这样妹子们的衣服就会逐渐破碎，这种感觉还是挺刺激的，特别是你给她们置办了符合自己XP的服饰时，然后去玩。除以上俩种外，若你在对战中前俩回合积攒出一个完整的爱心，在第三回合是有机会环顾对手的，但我觉得那时大家都在专心致志打连击，这个时候出这个好像不太符合时宜，而且就算看，其实也没有以上俩种具有冲击性，所以这个只能说是弱化向的福利吧。

最后说下其他方面，游戏的三种模式总体区别不大，主要还是看技术。剧情方面还是之前的味道，能不能代入还是看个人。功能还是祖传的更衣室，可以随意为妹子们进行搭配，排行榜提供了与其他人比较的方式，但无法线上对战。

[h1]游戏的总结[/h1]
总体而言，本作对于手残党来说需要一定的功夫才可以完美游玩，所以体验前一定得清楚自己是否有一番毅力去努力，主要推荐给对音游感兴趣与喜欢闪乱神乐系列的粉丝。

author: {'steamid': '76561198869980817', 'num_games_owned': 44, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 928, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 928, 'last_played': 1696734018}
review:
"Senran Kagura: Bon Appétit!" ofrece una experiencia de juego única y divertida que seguramente atraerá a los fanáticos de la serie "Senran Kagura" y a quienes disfrutan de los juegos de ritmo con un toque diferente. Aunque este spin-off se desvía de la acción ninja tradicional de la serie, ofrece una emocionante competencia culinaria que combina la música, la velocidad y la destreza en un solo paquete.

Una de las fortalezas del juego radica en su diversidad de personajes, cada uno con su propio conjunto de recetas y estilos de cocina. Esto agrega variedad y rejugabilidad, ya que puedes explorar diferentes personajes y sus historias mientras avanzas en el torneo. Los controles son intuitivos y fáciles de aprender, lo que hace que el juego sea accesible para jugadores de todas las edades.

La música y el diseño de sonido son agradables, y la combinación de ritmo y cocina crea una experiencia de juego fresca y emocionante. Además, la temática humorística y el enfoque en el fan service son características distintivas que pueden atraer a quienes disfrutan de un toque de sensualidad y humor irreverente en sus juegos.

En general, "Senran Kagura: Bon Appétit!" es un juego que ofrece una experiencia de juego única y entretenida. Si estás dispuesto a dejar de lado los prejuicios y te sientes cómodo con la temática provocativa de la serie, encontrarás en este título una experiencia de juego refrescante y divertida que te hará disfrutar de una competencia culinaria ninja como ninguna otra.

author: {'steamid': '76561198308066082', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 89, 'playtime_forever': 1446, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1436, 'last_played': 1696733360}
review:
Senran Kagura de ritmo musical, se fosse resumir este jogo em uma linha, diria isso.

Apresentando o que o jogo oferece. Primeiramente, como de costume de todos os jogos da Senran Kagura, há conteúdo ecchi, com apelação referente em todas as personagens. Quem já jogou outros títulos da série e/ou viu o anime, já sabe bem sobre isso.

Diferente da série principal, que é de porradaria, este aqui você basicamente escolherá uma das garotas e os modos de jogo disponíveis. Pode escolher uma batalha livre, modo arcade ou modo história (recomendo fortemente o modo história, pois a base da maioria das conquistas está neste modo). Também poderá acompanhar as pequenas histórias de cada personagem (em inglês).

A dificuldade, bom, o jogo dispões do modo fácil, normal e difícil. Recomendo o modo fácil caso não esteja acostumado com este tipo de jogo ou ainda prefira saber como funciona a mecânica do jogo. O modo normal seria o recomendável para a maioria, pois oferece um bom equilíbrio de dificuldade. Os 2 modos usam setas para baixo, esquerda ou direita, além dos botões X, B e A. O que muda do fácil para o normal é como eles são distribuídos nas músicas. Tem também o modo difícil, aqui o desafio é bem maior, pois além de aumentar a quantidade de, digamos, "notas" das músicas (botões a apertar), é adicionado ainda a seta para cima e o botão Y. Isso falando de um controle da Microsoft, que é o que uso. Mas dá para jogar no teclado também. As músicas mais difíceis para mim completar foram as da Miyobi e principalmente a da Daidouji (obviamente, ambas no nível hard).

O jogo conta com uma ampla variedade de roupas e acessórios (que sinceramente nem usei, quase), oferecendo também um modo extra que você pode mudar a vestimenta das garotas, além de ver cenas na cozinha e cenas específicas de vitórias perfeitas (da vítima, digamos assim, que perde a disputa), este é o momento de maior apelação ecchi do game, sem sombra de dúvidas.

Para completar o jogo inteiro, demandará um certo tempo e isto vai variar de sua habilidade e paciência (se vier a querer conquistar tudo), eu gastei 24 horas para isso.

Graficamente o jogo é OK, diria que é leve e tem gráfico do PSVita (que foi o console ao qual originalmente foi lançado, tendo posteriormente essa versão convertida para PC). O preço está bom, na minha opinião, mas, como o jogo é de 2016, costuma ter descontos no qual sai quase de graça. Enfim, eu recomendo o game para quem curte o estilo musical que o jogo propõe, com ressalva para quem eventualmente não curta conteúdo ecchi, pois aqui tem bastante.

author: {'steamid': '76561198965280381', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 138, 'playtime_forever': 16148, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 14063, 'last_played': 1699893994}
review:
游戏名称：SENRAN KAGURA Bon Appétit! - Full Course

评分：6.5/10

游戏概述：
《SENRAN KAGURA Bon Appétit! - Full Course》是一款由Marvelous Entertainment开发的音乐节奏游戏，是SENRAN KAGURA系列的一部分。游戏将SENRAN KAGURA女性角色放在烹饪比赛中，玩家需要通过音乐节奏来完成烹饪挑战。

游戏特点：

音乐节奏：游戏的核心玩法是音乐节奏，玩家需要按照音乐的节奏进行烹饪操作。

多个角色：玩家可以选择并控制多个不同的SENRAN KAGURA女性角色，每个角色都有自己的烹饪风格。

烹饪挑战：游戏包括多个烹饪挑战，玩家需要完成各种烹饪任务。

优点：

独特的音乐节奏玩法：游戏以音乐节奏为基础，为SENRAN KAGURA系列带来了不同寻常的玩法。

多样的角色：玩家可以选择多个不同的女性角色，每个角色都有独特的风格和烹饪技巧。

缺点：

有限的深度：游戏的玩法相对简单，可能缺乏深度和挑战性。

成人内容：与SENRAN KAGURA系列的其他游戏一样，游戏包含成人内容，可能不适合所有玩家。

总的来说，《SENRAN KAGURA Bon Appétit! - Full Course》是一款独特的音乐节奏游戏，以其将SENRAN KAGURA女性角色与烹饪挑战相结合的玩法而闻名。游戏的音乐节奏玩法有趣，但相对简单，可能不适合寻求更深度挑战的玩家。同时，游戏包含成人内容，因此可能不适合所有年龄段的玩家。如果您喜欢音乐节奏游戏，并且对SENRAN KAGURA系列感兴趣，那么这款游戏可能会吸引您。

author: {'steamid': '76561198166321567', 'num_games_owned': 370, 'num_reviews': 116, 'playtime_forever': 1460, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1460, 'last_played': 1693039173}
review:
闪乱神乐本体属于动作游戏，一向是福利为主，战斗次之，剧情为辅，而这一作属于重点强调发福利，主玩法音游和剧情都是添头，可以说是为了这点醋包了这顿饺子，但问题是你这饺子可不搭这醋。
细致流畅的料理动画、动作设计、分镜，质量很足，但是作为音游背景过于花里胡哨，晃眼睛，搭配起来相性极差。
看福利就没法打音游，打音游就没法看福利，你要是只看福利不打音游，那作为一款游戏从根本上就已经不合格了，而且也不配这个售价，去小红车下几个视频不香吗，花这个钱干什么。要是只打音游不看福利，那好玩的音游多了去了，轮得到玩这个？
我宁愿相信是制作组先灵光一闪搞料理主题，满腔热情建了模做好了动画，然后一时想不明白匹配什么玩法，最后不知道哪个缺心眼的一拍脑门定下来做的音游。
22个角色，一人一首曲子，总共22首，曲目数量已经拉到下限了，玩法也仅是音游入门级别，就这点内容，成就要求打满两百首歌，游戏时间硬投入20小时打底。身为PSV移植，看似适配了PC分辨率，结果除了3D建模以外，游戏里所有的贴图，包括UI和文字，全都有明显的狗牙，虽然帧数检测达到了稳定60帧，实际上音符移动有明显的掉帧，看着都是糊的。
所以不管是为了看福利，还是想支持闪乱神乐这个系列，买这个不如去买主打按摩那一作，那个感觉才是制作组想明白了做出来的东西。
一个忠告，游戏内置的解锁全部服装的作弊码，千万记得要在打完其他成就之后再用，提前用会导致当前存档无法解锁别的成就，解决办法是关云存档，另开一个存档位，找到本地存档，复制旧存档覆盖新开的存档，再开云存档，用新存档玩，新存档位既继承了旧存档的数据，也不会影响解锁成就。

author: {'steamid': '76561198114663877', 'num_games_owned': 4606, 'num_reviews': 248, 'playtime_forever': 1314, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1314, 'last_played': 1687650097}
review:
Great Rhythm game with plenty of fanservice.

I recommend to play it after Shinovi Versus. That way you already know the girls stories when playing this game, though it's not necessary if you don't care about that.

About difficulties:

- Easy: it's even relaxing
- Normal: challenging in a good way (Rin's song is very HARD though, Daidoji's is doable)
- Hard: I don't believe you really want to come here, unless you are a veteran playing rhythm games.

author: {'steamid': '76561198042135061', 'num_games_owned': 1804, 'num_reviews': 39, 'playtime_forever': 1783, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1250, 'last_played': 1686772741}
review:
[h1]Time to cook like your clothes depend on it[/h1]
If you have at any point seen Food Wars, imagine that but kind of on its own head.
However if you didn’t see a single episode of this Legendary anime, here’s how it goes. Character cooks a really amazing dish -> a judge eats the dish -> if the dish was 10/10, the judges clothes come ripping and flying off. This anime gave the term “food p*rn” a whole new meaning. Now this game is kind of like that, only the one who’s losing their clothes is the cook that did the worst job. It is kind of like Strip Poker only with vegetables, knives, spices and pastry. Honestly just another Tuesday in the Japanese Anime world.

[b]Gameplay[/b]
Let’s actually look at the game and dissect what it offers and ask if it’s any good.
At its core, this is a rhythm game consisting of 22 different songs with each having 3 different difficulties to choose from. You don’t really pick a song to play, rather you pick a girl to play against, each girl has her own “theme song” that will play and her own menu that will be cooked. You need to press 6 (up to 8 on hard) different buttons that scroll from right to left on a line, similar to games like Taiko. Each song is sort of split into 3 sections as you have two short intermissions to show you how you did. If you did good, you’ll be rewarded by tearing a piece of clothing on your opponent. If you did bad, the same happens to you. Honestly the more you look at this it looks like a win-win situation but I digress. If you do well enough to fully complete a heart, you’ll be able to strip them from everything they’ve got and also get a special scene where the girl at the very end is presented on a plate as food, complete with chocolate and whipped cream.
I am happy to say that I did not experience any motion sickness as someone who suffers from it with fast moving notes in Taiko-like games (or Mania like games, just really anything where there are fast moving objects you need to semi-focus on) and that’s largely due to the fact that the notes don’t really move that fast even on the fastest song. This can be a negative to those, who can’t handle dense note presentation as seasoned Rhythm players know, faster notes are not just making the game “harder”, it kind of makes it easier by lowering the density of notes you see at any given time. There's no way to speed this up so that might be a kicker for some people. As for the difficulties, everyone should find one that fits them here. I play Rhythm games recreationally, I found easy to be way too simple, normal hit just right on most songs and hard, while I could see the hardest difficulty to be even harder, still providing enough of a challenge if you want to try for perfect scores. This is not a hardcore rhythm game, it’s clearly way more of a casual game, which is not a bad thing, not everything has to have me sweating.

[b]Music[/b]
There’s enough variety for everyone to find a couple favourites, I don’t love every single song but I didn’t hate any either. For a fully original soundtrack, it’s really quite good. If music is a deciding factor for you, you can easily look up the OST on youtube and just skim through it to see if it would be to your liking at all. I would maybe just like to see more music if nothing else, but given they went with the “each character is a song” approach, I can accept this, it just kind of repeats a lot if you’re trying to finish every storyline.

[b]Story[/b]
Every character has a unique story to tell, they’re all fairly short and are presented in a Visual Novel kind of style, plus you get a nice key art for every character you finish the storyline with. The premise is the “Super Dish cook-off” that’s happening in town, with the main prize being a “secret ninja art scroll” that will grant its owner any wish, it’s like competing for a discount Genie. Every character has a different reason to enter the competition and the vast majority doesn’t even care for the scroll, which was a bit of a letdown I feel. Those who did want something out of the scroll happened to be my favourites out of the bunch. Either way, each story is ridiculous in its own way, it’s good comedy, like who enters the competition to win the scroll in order to wish to “be able to buy a refrigerator” for your room, only to realise in the end that you’re now missing a microwave in order to live the perfect “shut-in” life. 22 similar stories to go through, short and sweet, mostly consisting of just playing the rhythm game. You will have to go through 6 songs in each story on the difficulty you select at the beginning. I did all of it on Normal as I didn’t want to get stuck on songs where Hard would be a bit too rough, which worked out just fine.

[b]Graphics[/b]
This game originally came out on the PS Vita, it’s also 9 years old at this point so you can’t expect miracles out of it, however the models are quite nice, they clearly had higher poly versions saved. The only thing that really looks off is the underwear, on a PC display you can clearly see the quality being very low, you could almost count the pixels, destroying the “immersion” a bit. As for some other notes, game will only run on up to 60 fps, not the biggest of deals, but I would really like to see at least 120, thankfully as I said earlier, the notes don’t move nearly fast enough for this to be a big issue, 60fps is plenty playable, but the game would feel better on higher refresh rate.

[b]Other modes[/b]
There’s no way to alter the core gameplay, what you get is what you get. No adjustable note speed, no extra difficulty settings. You chose out of 3 modes to play. Story, Arcade or Free Mode. Story has 6 stages with Visual Novel-like sequences in between. Arcade is Story mode without the story part, 6 stages in quick succession. And free Mode as the name suggests is a simple pick and play, single song and done. There’s also the dressing room where you can put all kinds of clothes on every character, including a choice of underwear and accessories. Once you save their appearance they also appear like that when you play against them. In the dressing room you can also “play” with each character only most of them don't really appreciate the harassment.

[b]In the end[/b]
This is a really fun Rhythm Game, albeit probably the most distracting one, that will provide you with a great experience whether you have never played a rhythm game before or you’re a seasoned veteran. If you dislike pesky “godray” censorship, there's a way to remove this completely, simple model swap mod, isn’t it great to have a choice on PC? That’s why I didn't mention anything about censorship in the review as you can bypass it. Game is not very costly and if you manage to grab it on a sale, even better. I will leave you with a simple video that I quickly put together showcasing how the three difficulties differ on two songs. One faster, the other slower and you’ll be able to see that even the seemingly slow song can get quite hectic to play on Hard. Plus it gives you a chance to listen to some of my favourite songs from the selection. Bon Appétit!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jlxfhhIFlZw

author: {'steamid': '76561199289616302', 'num_games_owned': 545, 'num_reviews': 112, 'playtime_forever': 312, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 312, 'last_played': 1682075244}
review:
Muchos hablan de él, pero rara vez lo han probado bocas humanas: el pináculo de la perfección culinaria... el Súper Plato. Pocos shinobi han sido capaces de preparar un plato tan exquisito, pero el legendario shinobi y chef de sushi Hanzo cree que quizás sus alumnos y sus rivales estén a la altura. Organiza un concurso para ver cuál de las chicas puede perfeccionar mejor sus Artes Ninja para cocinar en lugar de combatir. La competencia es feroz; quien le presente a la anciana maestra shinobi el Super Dish obtendrá un Secret Ninja Art Scroll que hará realidad su más ferviente deseo. Quien pueda demostrar que su cuchillo es tan adecuado para la cocina como para el combate saldrá victorioso, mientras que todos sus amigos y rivales acabarán como un mero postre...

Un spin-off rítmico de la serie ninja 'busty brawler', SENRAN KAGURA, ¡Buen provecho! presenta batallas de cocina en lugar de enfrentamientos shinobi, con énfasis en el humor escandaloso, comida deliciosa e imágenes gratuitas de las encantadoras damas de la serie. Esta guerra culinaria se lleva a cabo a través de una variedad de batallas rítmicas, donde tocar los botones correctos al ritmo del ritmo acumulará combos y determinará el tamaño y la calidad del plato resultante. La banda sonora consta de una variedad de melodías pegadizas que abarcan todos los géneros, desde el jazz hasta la música clásica, con pistas vocales japonesas especiales cantadas por el líder de cada facción. Esta edición Full Course incluye todos los DLC y 22 ninjas rollizos entre los dos lanzamientos originales de PlayStation(r)Vita, recompensando a los jugadores que pueden superar el desafío de crear el Super Dish definitivo con un festín especial para los ojos también.

CARACTERÍSTICAS CLAVE
Spin-off rítmico de la popular serie SENRAN KAGURA
La infame y voluptuosa serie ninja se aventura en un nuevo género a medida que regresan todas las chicas saltarinas de SENRAN KAGURA Burst y SENRAN KAGURA SHINOVI VERSUS, tomándose un descanso del combate físico para hacer una guerra culinaria en esta sabrosa pero verdaderamente insípida aventura.
The Dressing Room regresa con opciones aún más elegantes
Al igual que otros títulos de SENRAN KAGURA, el vestidor hace otra aparición con múltiples formas de personalizar los atuendos de los personajes, ¡pero ten cuidado! Mira demasiado y te arriesgas a la ira de un shinobi de pleno derecho...
Tres modos de juego diferentes más tablas de clasificación en línea
El Modo Historia avanza a través del juego principal, el Modo Libre permite enfrentamientos de cocina personalizados y el Modo Arcade incluye tablas de clasificación completas en línea para ver cómo se compara con su competencia ya bastante apilada.
Incluye Hanzo x Crimson Squad original, paquete Gessen x Hebijo adicional y todos los DLC adicionales
Incluye ambos juegos que se lanzaron por separado en PlayStation(r)Vita, así como todos los DLC intermedios, ahora en resolución de 1080p y funcionando a 60 fps.

author: {'steamid': '76561199091077904', 'num_games_owned': 410, 'num_reviews': 279, 'playtime_forever': 1006, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1006, 'last_played': 1679922828}
review:
[도전과제 100% 완료]
[PC 플레이]
[게임을 선물해주신 Cold.B 님 정말 감사합니다]

보기만해도 므흣해지는 여캐들이 나와서 요리대결을 해나가는 섬란카구라 외전작품이다.
사실 신사들을 저격한 게임이다 보니 게임성에 대해서는 처음에는 기대를 하지 않고 플레이를 했었는데 생각보다 재밌어서 놀랐으며 어려움난이도 패턴이 진짜 손맛나게 잘짜여져서 더 놀랐었다.

게임 스토리는 거의 없는 거나 다름없는데, 각 캐릭터들의 짤막한 스토리엔딩이 전부, 공통적으로는 다른 캐릭터들과 요리대결을 통해 자신이 원하는 목표(?)를 이룬다는 그런 내용이다. 요리대결을 플레이어가 플레이하게 되고 이러한 플레이가 리듬게임의 요소이다.
리듬게임은 패드기준 십자버튼과 A,B,X,Y 버튼 그리고 인법사용버튼인 LB or RB를 사용한다, 쉬움과 보통난이도에서는 6개버튼을 이용하고 어려움난이도에서는 8개 버튼을 이용하게된다.

게임은 총 3페이즈로 이루어져있으며, 마지막 3페이즈에서 이기면 승리로 간주된다. 여기서 한 페이즈씩 질때마다 캐릭터들의 옷이 벗겨지는 광경이 나오며 1,2페이즈에서 하트를 다 채우면 3페이즈에서 하트노트가 나오는데, 이 하트노트를 누르면...  음... 직접 보길 바란다 ㅋㅋㅋ

여튼 이러한 정신나갈듯한 비주얼임에도 리듬게임 적으로는 꽤나 완성도가 높았다. 물론 디제이맥스나 이지투온 같은 리듬게임이 아니라서,  건반형 리듬게임에 재미를 많이 붙인 분들이라면 별로라고 생각할 수 있지만. 패드플레이 기준 생각보다 손맛이 찰져서 재밌었다. 그리고 판정도 후하기 떄문에, 리듬게임을 처음 접하는 분들도 쉽게 접근할 수 있을거라고 생각한다.
또한 랭킹모드도 있어 다른 유저들과 순위 경쟁도 할 수 있으니 어느정도의 파고들기 요소도 있어 괜찮았다는 생각이 들었다.

키보드로 즐길수도 있지만 패드로 즐기는 것도 재밌으니 간단한 리듬게임을 찾고 있는 유저라면 한 번 쯤 도전해봐도 괜찮은 게임이라고 생각한다. 단 후방주의 장면이 정말 많이 나오기 때문에 이점은 유의하길 바란다.

다시 한 번 재밌는 게임을 선물해주신 Cold.B님 정말 감사합니다~

author: {'steamid': '76561198851412461', 'num_games_owned': 264, 'num_reviews': 154, 'playtime_forever': 910, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 910, 'last_played': 1673713347}
review:
何か妙にむずい音ゲー
所謂六鍵、六ボタン式の音ゲーなので、難易度を上げると音ゲーをあんまやらない
自分にはクリアできない難しさでした
なぜこんなに難しくした……
あとこの音ゲーパート、バックでキャラたちが料理をしていてかわいいのですが、
高速みじん切りの演出が入ると、凄い目にダメージが入って辛い

シナリオとかは存在しないので、キャラに好きなコスチュームを着せたりして楽しむのが
メインのゲームでしょう
その手のセンスがない自分はみんな裸リボンにして終わりです……

音ゲーとしては楽しめないけど、女の子いじったりするのは面白いと思います多分

author: {'steamid': '76561198286026309', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 910, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 910, 'last_played': 1671617750}
review: This is a fun Senran Kagura rhythm game. The storylines are absolutely hilarious (most of them anyways). The comedy in this game is still top notch. The censorship still sucks, I'm not saying they should be nude but there are better ways to censor private parts. The flashing light is distracting and the pixelated chibi faces just suck (might as well go full res on the png if you're gonna go with the chibi face censoring). Anyways, the game is easy enough for someone who doesn't play rhythm games. If you regularly play rhythm games though, I'm sure you will thoroughly enjoy Senran's hard mode, though it might not be hard enough for you. I don't know much about the genre but hard mode was pretty challenging for me. I didn't like that it couldn't go all the way up to 1080p fuill HD though, missed opportunity there. But at the very least, it ran at 60fps and that is more than good enough for me. Game is super pretty, as are the characters. If you're looking to waste some time, look no further!

author: {'steamid': '76561198014618999', 'num_games_owned': 836, 'num_reviews': 97, 'playtime_forever': 79, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 79, 'last_played': 1594886691}
review:
Gordon James Ramsay OBE (/ˈræmziː/; born 8 November 1966) is a British chef, restaurateur, television personality and writer. His restaurant group, Gordon Ramsay Restaurants, was founded in 1997 and has been awarded 17 Michelin stars overall; it currently holds a total of seven.[1][2][3][4] His signature restaurant, Restaurant Gordon Ramsay in Chelsea, London, has held three Michelin stars since 2001.[5] After rising to fame on the British television miniseries Boiling Point in 1999, Ramsay became one of the best-known and most influential chefs in the United Kingdom.[6][7]

Ramsay's television appearances are defined by his bluntness, fiery temper, strict demeanour, and frequent use of profanity. He combines activities in the television, film, hospitality, and food industries, and has promoted and hired various chefs who have apprenticed under his wing. He is known for presenting television programmes about competitive cookery and food, such as the British series Hell's Kitchen (2004), Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares (2004–2009, 2014), and The F Word (2005–2010), with Kitchen Nightmares winning the 2005 British Academy Television Award for Best Feature, and the American versions of Hell's Kitchen (2005–present), Kitchen Nightmares (2007–2014), MasterChef (2010–present), and MasterChef Junior (2013–present), as well as Hotel Hell (2012–2016), Gordon Behind Bars (2012), Gordon Ramsay's 24 Hours to Hell and Back (2018–2020), and Next Level Chef (2022–present).

Ramsay was appointed an OBE by Queen Elizabeth II in the 2006 New Year Honours list for services to the hospitality industry. He was named the top chef in the UK at the 2000 Catey Awards, and in July 2006 he won the Catey for Independent Restaurateur of the Year, becoming only the third person to have won three Catey Awards. In 2020, Forbes listed his earnings at US $70 million for the previous 12 months and ranked him at No. 19 on its list of the highest-earning celebrities.[8]

author: {'steamid': '76561198400683450', 'num_games_owned': 349, 'num_reviews': 44, 'playtime_forever': 1341, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1338, 'last_played': 1674791310}
review:
The game itself is somewhat fun, albeit very repetitive, with only 22 songs. The story is divided into 22 characters, and have you playing 5 songs to reach the conclusion of each character's story. In each story, only 3 of these are of note with actual story significance and character interactions (first, fourth, and fifth), while the second and third battles become quite boring since there is no significance to it in the story with 0 interaction between the characters as those ones are always randomly selected, as in it will select a random character from the roster for you to go up against. 

The actual story moments and character interactions keep the Senran Kagura charm and are entertaining enough to play through each story, but the repetitive gameplay and shallow middle arc of each character's stories does drag on a bit. It's nothing too bad but I know there are plenty of people with less patience than me, and if you have no attachment to any of these characters, such as this being your very first Senran Kagura game, these probably won't keep you invested enough to continue playing.

While there aren't performance issues, some textures will look very bad, especially parts of the character models. The lingerie and chibi faces are of extreme note as they look especially ugly, retaining what seems to be their native PS Vita resolution. Other issues may include parts of the characters bodies where they are also noticeable such as low resolution feet, character faces sometimes looking like they have a double chin, and poor modeling quality for the chest region. 

The biggest part of a rhythm game is its music, however. So how does that fare? While music taste is subjective, there were no outright bangers or songs that I would legitimately like enough to put in a playlist. With only four songs having any vocals (excluding the non-playable opening), the majority of songs could be standard for the rest of the series in its soundtrack. They're not amazing songs that are super catchy, but they do fit in well with each character's personalities.

All in all, if you're a Senran Kagura fan who has played the first two and are looking for more, buying this on sale isn't the worst thing in the world and will satisfy your itch. 

Score: 6/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198394251993', 'num_games_owned': 426, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 2076, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 371, 'last_played': 1666028570}
review:
Bon Appetit es un juego rítmico perteneciente a la saga erótica de Senran Kagura, originalmente aparecido en la Nintendo 3ds como un Beat'em up y consolas de Sony Playstation como Hack'n'Slash. Sigue la tendencia de otros juegos que experimentan con otros géneros, con variada calidad con respecto a la franquicia de origen.

Este juego incluye todas las chicas de las cuatro academias principales junto con los personajes DLC, las cuales pueden ser seleccionadas en los diferentes modos de juego: Free play, Story Mode y Arcade Mode. Free play sería el equivalente al modo práctica y muy similar a Arcade mode, donde tu puntuación es comparada con otros jugadores online. 

El modo Historia sigue las motivaciones de cada personaje para entrar en el torneo de cocina. Se juega contra cinco personajes, siendo el segundo y el tercero elegido completamente al azar. Cada encuentro tiene tres rondas: las dos primeras sirven para desvertir a tu rival; la tercera es propiamente el juego dónde se decide al ganador. Es en esta ronda donde puedes ver secuencias de tu rival en primer plano en ropa interior si consigues las dos mitades del corazón restante. 

El juego tiene elementos de humor provenientes especialmente del presentador y tu maestro -el profesor de comida- si consigues una puntuación de "superior", la cuál iniciará una secuencia de vídeo  en relación con la comida preparada. Ocasionalmente hay situaciones de los personajes que te sacará una sonrisa por el doble sentido de las frases.  Lamentablemente, las motivaciones de los personajes suelen ser sosas si se compara con otras de la saga como Peach Beach Splash.

El sistema de juego es sencillo y se maneja principalmente en los tres nivels de dificultad con tres botones convenientemente señalizados de acuerdo al color de los botones de la XBOX: azul, rojo y verde. Aunque se controla mejor por teclado, es posible usarlo con gamepad pero tiene cierto retraso en los botones cuando tienes que pulsar simultáneamente dos de ellos. Otro defecto es que en ocasiones el color de fondo durante ciertas secuencias tiende a confundirse con los botones.

Músicalmente es bastante variado en cuanto a estilo y siempre asignado a un personaje rival. Los estilos abarcan desde música renacentista, polka, música tradicional japonesa, música fusión entre temas clásicos y rock hasta jazz. Cabe mencionar que la pulsación de botones intenta seguir el ritmo pero no siempre es así. En este sentido posiblemente bastante mediocre si se compara con otros juegos como Final Fantasy: Final Courtain o los dos juegos de Elite Beat Agents.

Por lo demás, nada importante que añadir. El fanservice sólo consiste en el desnudo convenientemente censurado por crema y chocolate cuando las chicas son mostradas en un plato de comida al conseguir perfectos en la ronda final. Sé que hay mods que quitan parte de la censura pero aún así es bastante suave. 

Sólo recomendable para pasar el tiempo y si te gusta los juegos musicales, inspirados o no en franquicias.

author: {'steamid': '76561198095857485', 'num_games_owned': 5162, 'num_reviews': 446, 'playtime_forever': 2660, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2660, 'last_played': 1661450053}
review:
SENRAN KAGURA Bon Appetit! is a rhythm based game where the purpose is to defeat your opponent in 3 rounds and strip them down completely.  The story is simple, there is a cooking competition being held and the prize is a magical scroll that can grant any wish.  Each of the ninja girls has their reasons for joining and competing (some of them have more bigger plans like world domination while others just want something silly like unlimited candy). The story is not to be taken serious and is def not the main focus of the game.

Each character has their specialty dish/theme when playing as them but overall the game play is pretty much them same for each character.  The game play can get tedious real fast but when keeps it interesting is def the fan service.  Just like other Senran Kagura games the locker room makes a comeback, in the locker room you can customize your waifu's with an assortment of outfits and accessories, you can also ummmm....play with ninja girls.

Overall the game is fun and has decent fan service but if your looking for a typical Senran Kagura game with the warriors type of combat then this is not for you.  This is one of those side SK games where it's more for some simple relaxing fun.  Def worth a pickup when its on sale or if you really like rhythm based games.

author: {'steamid': '76561198037056214', 'num_games_owned': 780, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 983, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 983, 'last_played': 1661033538}
review:
[h1] Приятного Аппетита! [/h1] [spoiler] было вкусно, но грустно [/spoiler]
Обзор рассчитан по-большей части на людей уже знакомых, так или иначе, с играми серии Сенран Кагуры. Так что плюсов наподобие: "Тут есть сиськи" или "Благодаря этой игре я научился готовить", не будет.
На момент написания обзора поиграл в Peach Beach Splash, Estival Versus и Shinovi Versus.

[b] Начну пожалуй с плюсов: [/b]
- Сама по себе хорошая идея для спин-оффа. Привносит разнообразие в геймплей игр серии, ну и в подачу самого фан-сервиса.
- Награды за Perfect Victory. Думал будут очередные дополнительные арты, но сделали хорошие разнообразные сценки, индивидуальные для каждого персонажа, а не вставили разных персонажей в одну и ту же.
- Забавные сцены с дедом (Ханзо). Сразу вспоминаются Кулинарные поединки Сомы.
- У каждой девушки своя характерная песня. Иногда можно услышать нотки знакомые вам из других известных композиций.
Но к сожалению, на эти немногочисленные плюсы в противовес есть и минусы, и даже больше.

[b] О минусах: [/b]
- Вернёмся к тем же наградам за Perfect Victory. Я не понимаю, на кой чёрт нужно было софтлочить камеру если и так всё зацензурено, какой-то бред.
- Сцены с дедом - круто, хорошо, но как же мало. Банально можно было бы разнообразить анимации его поведения между раундами в песне.
- Из-за того, что каждая песня принадлежит конкретному персонажу - очень малое разнообразие. Ведь их в игре не 100 и даже не 50. Поэтому треки приедятся уже спустя половину сюжетных историй.
- Нерабочий изначально контроллер. Чтобы он заработал, нужно отключить пользовательские настройки через стим, вообще или конкретно для этой игры через Big Picture. Хотя в предыдущих играх всё работало сразу же нормально.
- Странная выдача достижений. Они просто не отображаются при получении. Если свернуть игру, то можно увидеть, что они у вас есть, но если зайти в статистику достижений, там их не будет. Выдаются окончательно они только при выходе из игры.
- Какие-то траблы со сложностью. Знаете, я не люблю когда разработчик сам даёт тебе право выбора сложности, а потом этот выбор нарушает. Всё идёт как и должно.. и тут бац, неожиданно какой-то враг в 3 раза сильнее чем должен быть, а потом опять всё в норме. По какой-то необъяснимой причине лишь Рин в этой игре на лёгком уровне сложности, сложнее чем другие оппоненты раза в 2-3. Казалось бы и Дайдоджи должна быть такой же, но нет. Поднапрячься и задрочить - это несложно, но сам факт такой тупой системы крайне раздражает, особенно когда ты только начинаешь играть. Да и это не та игра в которую ты приходишь ради сложного геймплея.
- И напоследок: ЧЁРТОВЫ ФРИЗЫ. Как же они задолбали. Фризы происходят во время ритм игры, иногда очень слабые, иногда они руинят тебе нажатие нужных кнопок. Они есть даже во время анимации с дедом между раундами. И появляется мелкий рассинхрон самой песни и момента нажатия нужных знаков, словно не в ритм нажимаешь. Причём появляются они очень странно. Иногда их вообще нет в запущенной сессии, а иногда и перезаход в игру не помогает. Перепробовал всё, что рекомендовали в инете, безрезультатно. Ну это просто всратость какая-то, учитывая, что Shinovi Versus вышла раньше и там не было никаких технических проблем. К слову, и то, и то, порт с PlayStation Vita.

Не хочется даже выбивать все ачивки из-за всего этого. Вдобавок, чтобы их все получить, нужно пройти песню каждой героини на каждом уровне сложности (В предыдущих играх завязки ачивок на уровне сложности не было), а учитывая фризы и в какую рутину это превратилось, пройдя половину из их историй - нет, спасибо.
Я долго думал какую оценку поставить этой игре, но когда дописал обзор, окончательно решил, что минусы всё же переваливают. Если бы не техническая всратость и не скудное наполнение, вышло бы отличное ответвление от основной серии игр, но увы.

author: {'steamid': '76561198047342667', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 47, 'playtime_forever': 187, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 187, 'last_played': 1658513930}
review:
The difficulties are trash. Easy is beyond easy. Normal is hard af. Hard is near impossible. The key inputs for up, down, left, right are all the same colors as X, square, circle and triangle. The two rows of falling notes switch between them at no particular note change or natural flow, it simply is complicated just so you mess up. 

I try to relate this game to guitar hero or band hero. It's like they have 8 note inputs you can do, but color coordinate 1/2 to look similar to the other 1/2. Like if Down and X are being shown very quickly and they switch between the two rows, it's basically impossible for me to differentiate the blue ui scrolling if it has an X or is Down. This game is just unforgiving too. If you happen to win your first two rounds in a match, doesn't matter if you make a couple mistakes on last music segment, you will lose basically everytime. I tried to complete Asuka's story mission, with Daidoji being the final stage. Easily can complete first and second parts with 1-2 or no mistakes; everytime I get to the last music part, I failed and it was so frustrating because I can't simply train on that one part; I'd have to play the song over and over, getting through the first and second part, juuuuuust to "practice" on third part, even though we can't slow down music or pick a section like in guitar hero.


6/10 if this game was set up more like guitar hero, it'd be hands down a great ass game. But with the confusing similar color scheme for inputs, and confusing two rows seemingly trying to mess up the player for no reason.

I would've maybe had four-eight rows, and change the colors of up,down,left,right to different colors that green,blue,pink,red. Would've added a practice mode, with slow down features.

author: {'steamid': '76561198399266927', 'num_games_owned': 541, 'num_reviews': 80, 'playtime_forever': 1732, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1732, 'last_played': 1656193908}
review:
De la franquicia de anime donde el audiovisual con menos fanservice es en el que van a la playa, llaga Bon Appetit! El juego donde debes de llevar el ritmo par hacer que una shinobi cocine y le quite la ropa a otra.

Historia: Hanzo, en otro de sus muchos planes para ver chicas en paños menores o menos, obtiene un scroll que concede cualquier deseo. Decide que va a hacer un concurso de cocina y la ganadora se lo va a quedar. Y las 22 chicas de Senran Kagura no pueden resistirse por varias razones.

El fanservice está a la orden del día, muchas pantaletas y trajes desbloqueables y la música es suculenta. El gameplay es simple, pero no es fácil hacerse maestro en el, especialmente si los juegos de ritmo no son lo tuyo. Los finales varían desde hilarantes hasta "¿Qué demonios...?", pasando por romances, tetas, colas, y juventud eterna.

Llegas por las boobies. Te quedas por lo demás. 

Desafortunadamente partes del juego son tan complicadas que te morderas los dedos antes de lograrlas. Sin embargo vale la pena. Además, es un excelente juego para mejorar la concentración, pues si te quedas viendo los "especiales" *Guiño guiño* No vas a llegar a ningún lado.

7/10 platillos

author: {'steamid': '76561199177989835', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 331, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 191, 'last_played': 1676695004}
review: If you're a fan of both Senran Kagura and rhythm games, this game is a blast. The gameplay has the perfect amount of difficulty to it, and it has the dressing room mechanics like any SK game would.  However, compared to the other games in the franchise, the controller support is bad, the models are much lower quality and the fan service is a bit overdone to a point of becoming an annoyance. Yes, Senran Kagura has always been big on fanservice and that's totally fine, but when a character's butt starts to wiggle at me as I'm trying to keep a beat, it makes me uncomfortable and I lose the rhythm. As well as that, Hanzo's cutscenes are also way overdone, repetitive and REALLY annoying.  However, the game itself is fun. I love going through each girl's storyline, and I love hearing all of the character's awesome themes.

author: {'steamid': '76561198236743004', 'num_games_owned': 1829, 'num_reviews': 673, 'playtime_forever': 357, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 357, 'last_played': 1646921485}
review:
[quote]
[th]关注[url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/39039781]斗鱼游戏社区[/url]，随时了解主播推荐的好游戏。[/th]
[tr][th]访问[b]斗鱼鱼吧社区[/b]参与互动，活动好礼送不停！[/th][/tr]
[/quote]

[h1] 引言[/h1]
《闪乱神乐：忍乳负重（SENRAN KAGURA Bon Appetit!）》是一款由Marvelous AQL制作的，以“料理对决”为主题的音乐类节奏游戏。
本作是《闪乱神乐》系列的一款番外性质的作品，剧情与本篇没有什么联系，玩法、系统也与本篇的割草无双差异极大。不过即使是以烹饪为主题的游戏，游戏中失败的一方也仍然会被爆衣，并且达成一定条件还能欣赏对面的“女体盛”。
本作最初于2014年4月24日发行于PSV平台，后续于2014年11月登陆PS3平台，在2016年11月10日正式登陆PC端。
 


[h1] 爆量美食大赛[/h1]
游戏开场，一段CG简明的阐述了本作的大致背景故事。
故事讲述飞鸟的祖父，同时也是身为传奇忍者的「半藏」，宣扬爆量美食，并举办了一场爆量美食大赛，比赛的冠军将能够获得据说无论是什么愿望都能实现一次的「秘传忍法书」。
由此引来的22位美少女之间进行的美食对决。

[h1] 游戏模式[/h1]
《闪乱神乐：忍乳负重》总共分为三种主要游戏模式：故事模式、通关模式和自由模式，和三个难度级别：简单、普通和困难。
 
故事模式下，第一场、第四场和第五场的战斗对手固定，并且对战之前和对战之后都有一些过场动画、人物对话的剧情表现，作为一款音游，剧情算是不错的了。（没错，有剧情就算不错！#滑稽）
 
而通关模式是选定玩家角色和难度后，连续进行六场战斗，具有爆衣动画等内容，但不具有剧情。感觉和故事模式差异较小，区别应该是在于中途不能保存，面对固定组合与顺序的对手，考验玩家能否一命通关。
而自由模式则允许玩家任意挑选指定角色进行战斗PK，先选自己的角色，然后选择想要挑战的对手/歌曲。适合用来针对性看角色喜欢的角色的爆衣。
 
[h1] 游戏难度[/h1]
本作采用的不是下落式的音符轴，而是横向前进式，有些像是太鼓达人，却又具有两条音符轴。玩家需要的按键分别是“上下左右”和“WASD”，也就是八键双轨的玩法。特殊符号总共两种，一种是：长按、另一种则是连打。
游戏难度分为容易、普通、困难，同一对手，不同难度情况下，音乐不变，但会有更快节奏、更多的音符出现。除此之外，“W”和“↑”符号只有在困难难度才会出现。
 
音游不像动作游戏，没有什么配装，也没有什么一招鲜吃遍天，就没有什么偷空耍滑的技巧，单纯比拼手速、眼力还有熟练度。
个人体验下来，容易难度很简单，很轻松！因为音符出现的间隔足够大，没有音游基础的同学也不至于手忙脚乱。
但是游戏难度的增长就有些跳跃式了，普通难度与困难难度都让我这个手残很头大，主要不在于跟不上音符的出现，而是高难度的谱会非常花，对于我这个手残来说，根本反应不过来要按的是哪个键，识谱难！

[h1] 每首歌都要进行三轮比拼[/h1]
游戏的每次比赛，或者说每一首歌，都分为三个不同菜式的烹饪阶段。但比赛的最终获胜只与第三轮有关，即使在第一、二轮你打的再出色，第三轮分数落后还是算你输。
 
但第一、二轮的比赛成绩也不是说没有用，前两轮分别达到一定分数后，会分别获得半瓣爱心，当第三轮具有一整颗爱心标记时，会在音符轴中出现“心型符号”，不miss就能看一段对手的特写镜头。（一般，不够色！没有精神！重来！）

并且只有三个阶段都取得优势的情况下，才能获得完全胜利，对战结束之后才会送上“女体盛”的福利动画。


[h1] 老传统的更衣室，但本作不支持联机游玩[/h1]
除了音游内容与爆衣内容外，本作与闪乱神乐系列其他游戏一样，还包括更衣室，允许玩家自定义每个角色的外观，本作的衣服是随着故事模式的推进而逐步解锁的。
 
虽然本作具有“排行榜”，允许玩家通过互联网连接将自己的分数与其他玩家的分数进行比较，但本作并不支持联机游戏，无法与好友进行线上PK

[h1]优点[/h1]
1.福利向游戏，大又白嘿嘿，赢了看对面爆衣，输了看自己爆衣，好像怎么都不亏。
2.虽然是移植游戏，但本作中系统按键与音符按键的标注是正确的，没有用键盘却标注的是手柄LB/RB之类的情况，对键盘有良好的适配。（就是↓键确认，→键返回有些难以适应）

[h1] 缺点[/h1]
1.作为一款移植老游戏，画质现在看有些粗糙了。
2.游戏的歌曲数比较少，每次对决的比拼歌曲是按照对手是谁来决定的，而游戏一共只有22个角色，所以只有22首歌曲。


[h1] 总结/推荐人群[/h1]
作为一款2016年登陆PC的游戏，已经过了这么久的一款移植老游戏，画质现在看都有些粗糙了，自然也是不推荐大家原价购买的。
并且本作抛开福利外，没有什么内涵，不算好玩，歌曲不多，难度方面也可以作为手残杀手，作为绅士游戏又单纯只是爆衣，倒不如去直接寻找更进一步的纯工口游戏去玩。
所以仅推荐对音游与福利游戏都感兴趣的绅士玩家，待打折，等一个史低入手。
 

[quote]
加入[url=https://steamcommunity.com/groups/GHYX]干货游戏[/url]&关注[url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/35106417/]我的鉴赏家[/url]，不定期为大家带来诚意满满的游戏体验干货。
[/quote]

author: {'steamid': '76561198326846247', 'num_games_owned': 533, 'num_reviews': 73, 'playtime_forever': 83, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 42, 'last_played': 1647237205}
review:
La vida de un crítico es sencilla en muchos aspectos . Arriesgamos poco y tenemos poder sobre aquellos que ofrecen su trabajo y su servicio a nuestro juicio . Prosperamos con las críticas negativas divertidas de escribir y de leer . Pero la triste verdad que debemos afrontar , es que en el gran orden de las cosas , cualquier basura tiene más significado que lo que deja ver nuestra crítica .
Pero en ocasiones el crítico si se arriesga cada vez que descubre y defiende algo nuevo .El mundo suele ser cruel con el nuevo talento . Las nuevas creaciones , lo nuevo necesita amigos . Anoche experimente algo nuevo . Una extraordinaria cena de una fuente singular e inesperada . Decir solo que la comida y su creador han desafiado mis prejuicios sobre la buena cocina , subestimaria la realidad . Me han tocado en lo más profundo .
En el pasado , jamás oculte mi desdén por el famoso lema del Chef Gusteau : "Cualquiera puede cocinar" . Pero al fin , me doy cuenta de lo que quizo decir en realidad : No cualquiera puede convertirse en un gran artista , pero un gran artista puede provenir de cualquier lado .
Es difícil imaginar un origen más humilde , que el del genio que ahora cocina en el Restaurante Gusteau y quién en opinión de este crítico , es nada menos que el mejor Chef de Francia . Pronto volveré al Restaurante Gusteau , hambriento.

review: Surprisingly good rhythm game. It's easy to make fun of the Senran Kagura series, but the games are decidedly solid.

author: {'steamid': '76561198126767270', 'num_games_owned': 332, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 854, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 194, 'last_played': 1648928138}
review:
劇情模式總算全角色通關
更新一下評價

有幾首歌曲聽習慣還是蠻不錯的
甚至魔音穿腦自動在腦中輪播

難度方面還是只有遊玩簡單模式
不過已經可以輕取新手魔王凜老師的主題曲了

若是歌曲的長度設計成short ver
降低失敗重玩的排斥感
或許會讓玩家踴躍挑戰更高難度享受遊戲
而非為了通關在簡單模式按到快睡著

更衣室的內容也很豐富
美中不足是模組差強人意
另外過場CG沒有收錄在畫廊也稍嫌可惜

整體來說還是對得起價格，所以特此改為正評

--------------------------------------------------

有點難度的音遊
普通嘗試了一下發現無法招架
簡單卻又無聊到像在幫手指復健

想說罷了，就劇情模式速速通關
體驗到的乏味冗長卻屢屢勸退

每首歌曲太長，大部分曲風也不太符合我個人喜好
常常聽曲調感覺要收尾了，沒想到又有一段
勝負特地分三局，但結果也只看末盤
每個角色還硬塞兩個沒劇情的過場關
一切順利一個角色也要約20分鐘才能CLEAR

但簡單模式有刺客曲，偶爾還來個閃退
運氣差就要耗將近一個小時了

IP的內容吸引購買，遊玩的過程令人放棄
完全體現出都花錢買遊戲了，誰還要花時間玩

除非能接受上面的缺點，不然不推薦購買

author: {'steamid': '76561199097537912', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 350, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 243, 'last_played': 1688512972}

review:
Personalmente el juego no me disgusta, en las primeras partidas me entretuvo, pero no voy a mentir, para ser un juego de ritmo podría haber sido mejor mas allá del ecchi, se que esa es la esencia de la franquicia y no me molesta porque ya antes de este jugué otros juegos de Senran Kagura, pero el problema es que tiene tan poquitas canciones que se puede volver algo repetitivo, sobretodo porque de esas pocas, sólo unas cuantas son buenas, el resto son meh...

Sólo lo recomendaría si eres muuuy pero muuuuy fan, si nunca jugaste un SK antes aléjate de este juego. Y si deseas comprarlo espera a que esté en oferta, porque no siento que valga el precio que tiene.

author: {'steamid': '76561199057983216', 'num_games_owned': 65, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 251, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 110, 'last_played': 1659294492}
review:
Игра на 2-2000 часов.

В ней очень интересно поставлен сюжет и раскрытие персонажей. Каждый персонаж проработан до мелочей и за его развитием интересно следить. Ты наблюдаешь за его (её) ростом, за его успехами и за отношения с другими персонажами, которые выстраиваются во время прохождения игры. Каждый персонаж уникален, каждый имеет свою способность и свою историю.

Гейплейно игра является ритм игрой, в которой задействованы 6 разных кнопок, а также они двигаются на двух разных линиях. По началу будет сложно играть, так как многие ритм игры задействуют 1-2 кнопки, а тут целых 6 (также 2-е кнопки отвечающие за ульту). В игре есть 3-и сложности, а также не так уж и мало разных песен, которые звучат очень круто и прикольно.

Игру я настоятельно рекомендую, так как таких эмоций от игры вы нигде не получите.
p.s Автор писал это мнение на полном серьезе.

author: {'steamid': '76561198049792048', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 68, 'playtime_forever': 577, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 433, 'last_played': 1640747139}
review:
This game is hilarious, fun, sexy, and just all around a good time. 

The actual gameplay is highly similar to DDR; it's a rhythm game. It's a lot harder though IMO since you have to use both WASD and the arrow pad. So I guess it's more like if you played DDR's double-mode (where one player uses both pads), but on your keyboard. Personally I suck at hand-eye coordination, but even I managed to get decent at this game with some practice.

If all you're here for is the non-gameplay content, Easy mode is there and you can see the story and all the cutscenes that way. However, a good amount of the costume pieces can only be unlocked on Normal and Hard mode though. I think it's a good balance of rewarding both casual and experienced players.

Btw, there is an uncensored mod, it's available on Lover's Lab. Just do a Google search for 'Lovers Lab Sengan Kagura Bon Appetit uncensor mod.' It's as easy to install as dropping a folder into the game files, and works perfectly.

author: {'steamid': '76561198025249468', 'num_games_owned': 3742, 'num_reviews': 67, 'playtime_forever': 1114, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 254, 'last_played': 1657566990}
review:
Any gentleman who fancies himself a bit of an intellectual and connoisseurs of Japanese high culture should have this game in his collection if he wants to be taken seriously by other enjoyers of the fine arts, desu.
It's basically Shokugeki no Soma turned into a rhythm game with the lewdness turned up to eleven. I find the music ranges from bearable  to ear-wormish good, but tastes vary so just listen to the OST on youtube and decide if you could enjoy the game with that music. Graphics are mostly okay except for the potato quality textures used for some of the GUI elements. The physics, the most important part of every rhythm game of this special kind, aren't very realistic but serviceable because everything jiggles with excitement.

The game gets a high  umai / 10 rating from me.

author: {'steamid': '76561198064329438', 'num_games_owned': 207, 'num_reviews': 111, 'playtime_forever': 1981, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1981, 'last_played': 1638976485}
review:
全成就達成 這是一款音樂遊戲 不算簡單 看你玩了多少音遊而決定遊戲難度
簡單難度和普通難度是6鍵 困難難度是8鍵 每個難度都是不同的遊戲 
自己最多可以全連普通難度 凜姐姐的bgm おかくごめされよTEACHER 的程度 忍法等級有19（這首簡單難度也不是簡單 全連的話忍法等級14 簡單難度最難玩的歌曲） 困難難度8鍵實在是太難了 直接變了另一個遊戲 我只能看攻略打作弊指令去解鎖剩下的內衣去解內衣成就

手殘玩家建議考慮一下才入手這個遊戲 畢竟不是簡單遊戲

author: {'steamid': '76561199026951145', 'num_games_owned': 638, 'num_reviews': 102, 'playtime_forever': 25, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 25, 'last_played': 1638312511}
review:
毕竟也算个音游人，冲着音游+naizi去的
音游做得不大行，不过也没啥问题，可以当作练习手柄玩音游的软件（虽然我根本就不想用手柄玩音游——这玩意的设计就不是为了给人拿来打音游的好嘛，十字键按久了我手都没了）
不过，人物建模也做得不大行，或者说——很不行……你好歹也是个16年的游戏啊喂，看看人家I社的恋活……
不过结尾CG够涩，我好了
打折以后20不到的游戏，达到这个质量足够我给出好评了
也就不退款了，不过它大概率会吃灰吧
毕竟，我不想拿手柄打音游，更不想拿键盘打8键二轨音游

author: {'steamid': '76561198135265569', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 1187, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 995, 'last_played': 1691540131}
review:
This is a nice, challenging game that's easy to pick up. It doesn't take too long to play a round or two in free play and doing so can unlock clothes for the cute girls to wear. Free play also allows you to get used to the song patterns which will be handy when you switch to story or arcade mode. The game itself is simple, challenging fun. At this price it's a recommend, and it's definitely worth acquiring when it goes on sale. 
Mirai is the best girl because flat is justice.

author: {'steamid': '76561198809411577', 'num_games_owned': 579, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 1045, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 86, 'last_played': 1661827347}
review:
キャラ二人をイージーで通しただけで、この回答は恐らく正解だろう。冒頭も冒頭だったし。

音ゲーの皮を被ったバカゲーである。

このノリ、自分は好きだわ。シリーズを順にやってきて、キャラクター性を知ってるからこそなんだろうけど。残りの注意点としては、物語性を求めてはいけない。
なお、音ゲー要素とバカゲー要素を除くと、閃乱カグラらしい要素が残る。とんでもないスピンオフ作品に仕上がっている。
気が向いた時にプレイして、短時間で片付くのも結構イイ感じ。自分のプレイ時間がジリジリと伸びるのは確定である。

----- 追記 -----
これはアレだ。ある程度プレイしたが、一周回って音ゲーに戻ってくる。その一端を垣間見た。

author: {'steamid': '76561198248280064', 'num_games_owned': 2913, 'num_reviews': 174, 'playtime_forever': 1038, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1038, 'last_played': 1553121215}
review: SENRAN KAGURA Bon Appétit! est un jeu de rythme musical culinaire spin off, destiné à un public adulte, où l'on voit s'affronter les personnages de la série, dans des combats de cuisines dégantés. Même, en faisant abstraction du côté adulte et ecchi du titre, ça reste un excellent jeu musical, amusant, prenant et très agréable à jouer. La musique est au petit oignon, c'est très fun et il y a plusieurs niveaux de difficultés, pour les débutants et les plus compétitifs. Si vous aimez déshabillez vos adversaires ninjas dans des battles culinaire, en rythme, bah foncez!

author: {'steamid': '76561199068739556', 'num_games_owned': 406, 'num_reviews': 180, 'playtime_forever': 1324, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1324, 'last_played': 1626624561}
review:
▽実績コンプ時間
約23時間

[h1]総評[/h1]
[hr][/hr]

サマーセールにて購入

EVを先にやったせいか、解像度の低さやモデリングの作りこみの粗さがどうしても気になってしまう。
まずはxboxのコントローラーがゲーム起動時はパットとして認識をするのにゲームが始まると反応がなくなる点については
ゲーム別のコントローラー設定でSteam入力を無効にしなければならない。

キーボードで操作しようとすると割り当てが予想の上を行く使いづらい設定になっているので注意が必要。
マウスカーソルの判定位置もおかしいので、マウス＆キーボードでやるゲームではない

本作は音ゲーという名のボタン覚えゲーです。
太鼓の達人のような上下譜面ですが、そこに矢印キーとボタンキーの計8つの判定が入り混じるので難易度・難はとてつもなく難しい。

一部リズムと明らかにあってない譜面もあるので、譜面を完全に覚えないとフルコンボは難しいです。
なんというか音ゲーを普段作らない開発陣が作ったの難易度・難のゲームって感じがします。

ボーカル入りの曲も6つと登場人物の多さの割には少なく感じます。
周回プレイが何回も求められるので半蔵と脱衣演出は後半はうざくなってくるかも

頭のおかしいストーリーと更衣室のシステムは好きです。
あと両備が可愛い

[h1]実績[/h1]
[hr][/hr]
　200回クリアと秘伝忍術500回の累計実績がプレイ時間を長くする要因です。
隠しコマンドを入れれば下着コンプリートは簡単ですが、使わないと最高難易度の取得率となるでしょう。
私は5人ぐらいで諦めました。凛さんとか普でもフルコン難しいのに難は無理やで

[h1]値段[/h1]
[hr][/hr]
セール時に買いましょう

author: {'steamid': '76561198021585894', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 46, 'playtime_forever': 767, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 561, 'last_played': 1636643497}
review:
Не отрываясь смотрел на экран, а по кнопкам так ни разу не попал....


А если серьезно, то неплохая ритм-игра со знакомым по франшизе фансервисом: много сисек, много попок, много забавных юморесок. 
Не смотря, что контента по факту в игре мало, игра совсем не напрягает. Можно расслабиться на легком уровне сложности, а можно пригореть уже и на нормальном. Музыка и песни веселы и динамичные. Своевременная отдача клавишей работает без нареканий, что очень важно для ритм-игр.

Главная претензия же состоит в багованых достижениях, которые либо выпадают через раз, либо вообще не выпадают. Я прошел "сюжетки" за всех девчонок, а трофей выпал только за Аску. Ну что за нах?

Надеяться на какие-то исправления бессмысленно, так как игра уже старая и давно понятно что разработчики положили на все свои огромные.... футомаки.

author: {'steamid': '76561198019112527', 'num_games_owned': 1395, 'num_reviews': 163, 'playtime_forever': 501, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 501, 'last_played': 1624600931}
review:
I like to post reviews of finished games for me to remember, but since this game has nothing else to offer I am going to post my review after playing my favorite characters from senran Kagura (in no particular order since is really hard to choose): Katsuragi, Ryouna, Asuka, Yumi, Yozakura, Miyabi, Ikaruga, Homura.

The game it self is a simple rythm game, but it gets really difficult and confusing in the normal setting, I am not new to rhythm games since i've played: DDR, pump it up, bust a groove, Space channel 5, rhythm heaven, elite beat agents, Osu! Tatakae! Ouendan, Moero! Nekketsu Rhythm Damashii Osu! Tatakae! Ouendan 2, etc, so I know how to play games that goes with the beat, The world ends with you DS (because you have to use dual screens to play).

The worst thing about this game is that it gets really confusing because it uses 2 command inputs, i can't play in normal, may be it's because of the gamepad settings (unlike DDR and PIU), it's hard to concentrate on dual lines, with bust a groove I didn't had this problem and I am sure, i remember, you also have to do dual inputs. 

Anyways the game and the achievements give you nothing if you play in harder dificulties, so just enjoy the girls stories.
The whole "Single player story" of the game is like Heart of a girl stories that feature in shinovi versus, estival versus, burst renewal, beach splash, every girl gets their own wish according to their own personality. (Miyabi and Yumi are already the same in like 3 different games, they just want to be girly and cute, oh, also katsuragi and ryoune they just want to fullfill their own lust with boobs and  BDSM)

The game is a 7/10, just because I really enjoy the girls stories, but gameplay wise is like a 3/10 because even if you win 2/3 rounds you lose, and also if you fail the first 2 rounds you don't get the hearth bonus to get more ecchi, pretty lame.

Anyways, as all Spin off games just buy it if you like the core games, because the game has nothing new to offer.
You can't even transfor into a super ninja, the gauge just becomes fire.

author: {'steamid': '76561198112878166', 'num_games_owned': 539, 'num_reviews': 286, 'playtime_forever': 178, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 118, 'last_played': 1622919201}
review: 你听我狡辩，这真的是音游啊！建议配合手柄使用。难度有简单普通困难三个梯度，每个角色的故事线需要打5个回合，每个回合3个阶段，3个阶段中有2个保持80%的优势就能拼完爱心解锁爆衣，最后第5回合是最终BOSS关。难度梯度是有的，普通难度的BOSS关我自己是打的很吃力，因为需要同时兼顾ABXY和↑↓←→两条线的音符，有时候镜头切换给角色放大招什么还会有点影响视线，有时候还会和NS手柄弄混把ABXY记错，建议没有音游基础的同学只玩简单难度。

author: {'steamid': '76561198033160603', 'num_games_owned': 1204, 'num_reviews': 90, 'playtime_forever': 2049, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1726, 'last_played': 1648831426}
review:
[h1]Адская кухня![/h1]
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vXk7G7uNal8
Только в прошлый раз я просил у Сеги порт Persona 4 Dancing All Night, как судьба подкинула мне Bon Appétit. Не совсем то, что я имел ввиду, но тоже сойдёт. В общем-то, это всё та же SENRAN KAGURA, только в этот раз направленная на людей, склонных к ситофилие. 

Сюжет прост, как оладушек: Директор местного кулинарного училища окончательно двинулся по фазе и решил на старости лет устроить супер конкурс по готовке еды, победителю которого достанется возможность исполнить одно желание. История каждого персонажа, а их тут 22 штуки, представляет из себя вариацию на тему "А что, если?" Желания у девчонок самые разные: кто-то хочет себе роскошную грудь, кто-то холодильник, кто-то хочет просто поесть на халяву. Мира во всём мире или типа того никто пожелать не додумался, что делает из героинь довольно эгоистичных тупых сучек. Главная тян всей серии игр вообще страдает болезненным влечением ко всему длинному и толстому. И она желает, чтобы всё в этом мире было таковым. Ну, чего ещё ожидать от игры, в которой женская одежда рвётся от сильных звуковых вибраций. 
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2416691190
По части геймплея тут всё ещё проще. Играли в Yakuza? Помните Baka Mitai? Растяните его на всю игру и геймплей готов. У нас есть две полосы, по которым справо налева поочерёдно движутся кнопки ←, ↓, →, а также А, В, Х на геймпаде. Нажимаем нужную кнопку в такт играемой мелодии - побеждаем. Вверху показано, в какую сторону склоняется решение судьи, слева снизу находится колесо, по заполнению которого можно активировать искусство ниндзя персонажа через RB или LB. Но на самом деле оно ничего не делает. Его нужно прожимать, чтобы получить ачивку.
В правой части экрана также находится сердечко, розовеющее по мере нашего успеха. Заполнили его правую и левую часть в первых двух частях уровня, поймайте его в третьей части, и в конце покажут мультик, да не один. Вот и всё. Если у вас есть хоть немного музыкального слуха, прохождение каждой истории не составит никакого труда, при условии, что у вас нет аллергии на J-pop.  

Песен здесь 22, по одной на каждого персонажа. Их выбор зависит от того, против кого мы играем. Встречаются как с вокалом, так и без него. По количеству преобладают вторые. По качеству - зависит от ваших музыкальных предпочтений.  У меня проблем не было, я их напеваю уже почти месяц, и все окружающие меня люди твердят, чтобы я заткнулся...  В общем, музыка разноплановая. Есть даже какой-то странный кавер на свадебный марш Мендельсона... Я тоже не понял, зачем он тут.

А вот визуал у игры неоднозначный. Видите ли, Full Course - это порт с портативной консоли PS Vita. Экран у неё, как не сложно догадаться, маленький и именно под него делалась вся игра. При переносе игры на большой монитор разработчики подогнали под него 3D изображения. Модельки героинь выглядят прилично, только не забудьте в настройках поставить сглаживание на х8, а то зубцами, торчащими по контурам их тел можно деревья пилить. С другой стороны 2D изображения никто трогать не стал, ну или не смог, а значит все арты, ровно как и вступительный ролик, смазаны добротным слоем мыльца, что немного подпортит впечатления. 

Bon Appétit! находится на том же уровне исполнения, что и Peach Ball, но плюсов у этой игры чуть больше. Она немного дешевле, в неё входят все DLC с костюмами и персонажами, выходившими для PSV, она не так сильно надоедает, если играть небольшими порциями. Здесь нет режима Диорамы, что плохо, но зато никто не просит у тебя лишние 100 рублей за дополнительные 5 поз для него или 300 рублей за 4 новых костюма. Это оставили для других игр серии...
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2453908361
[h1]Кароче, Bon Appétit! на самом деле игра очень сексистская, ведь она навязывает факт того, что место любой женщины - на кухне.[/h1]

review:
Gosta de jogo de ritmo? ótimo!
Gosta de seminudez com temática de comida? ótimo também (se vc se incomodar só por isso entao nem lê o resto) veja mais detalhes pq esse review é bem útil pra vc <3

Pontos positivos: 
* É jogo de ritmo
* É baseado em anime
* As músicas são bacanas
* As histórias tem sentido (apesar do fanservice e serem historias bem random mas deve ser pq n assisti o anime em si)
* Dá pra customizar bem as personagens (em questão de roupa e acessórios)

Pontos negativos
* Controles meio bugados (talvez não ouve uma conversão nos comandos pra um teclado em pt entao no começo fica horrivel jogar sem ter q mexer nos comandos e reconfigurar as vezes fica chato pra alguns)
* Pouca configuração (se vc tiver com algum problema de resolução ou algo mais especifico tem q configurar fuçando em arquivos na pasta do jogo)

author: {'steamid': '76561198148401542', 'num_games_owned': 638, 'num_reviews': 243, 'playtime_forever': 333, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 333, 'last_played': 1613673620}
review:
[h1]Introduction[/h1]
[b]Senran Kagura: Bon Appetit (SKBA)[/b] is a [b]rhythm cooking[/b] game that has been ported from the [b]Playstation Vita[/b] version. I love the [b]SK[/b] series, I mean who would not love a game series with busty ninja girls fighting each other while ripping their clothes off!? A game like this on paper sounds like a good idea. I mean a cooking game with a rhythm element meshed into it with wacky moments certainly seems appealing to me personally. However, this game is more of a hollow shell that promises us a good [b]SK[/b] game but fails to do so.

[h1]Pros and Cons[/h1]
[b]Pros[/b]
[list]
[*]All of the characters have their own distinct stories.
[*]Lots of cosmetics to put on the characters to make them look unique.
[/list]

[b]Cons[/b]
[list]
[*]None of the stories felt that interesting to really complete.
[*]The gameplay while fun at first, becomes very stale and repetitive.
[*]For a rhythm game, there is a lacking tracklist with no standout songs.
[*]There is not a lot of replay value to go back and play the stages.
[*]There is no multiplayer in this game.
[*]Some of the achievements are bugged.
[*]The graphics and resolution are badly rendered in certain parts of the game.
[/list]

[h1]Story[/h1]
The very first annual cook-off competition is starting and the reward is a [b]Secret Ninja Art Scroll[/b]. This scroll can grant anyone's wishes and will be held in the [b]Hanzo Street Shopping District[/b]. This tournament is hosted by [b]Hanzo[/b] the legendary ninja himself, and despite being a ninja, he has his own plans for how the tournament is to be handled, manly in his desires. The scroll also contains hidden truths that shine a light on some darkness and a veil of shocking conspiracies.

Each character will go through their own stories and will have a set amount of story segments attached to them. With that in mind, I can’t exactly go over the stories in detail as there are many of them to talk about. This does make each of the stories unique in their own right, as they have something different to them.

Even though each character offers an individual story from the other characters, the stories lack engagement and just feel shallow which discouraged me from completing all of them.

[h1]Gameplay[/h1]
[b]SKBA[/b] has three game modes for you to choose from, story mode, arcade mode, and free mode. Regardless of the mode chosen you will be put into [b]cooking battles[/b] which will be a 1v1 to see who will win. You will have a set amount of button presses that you will need to time correctly to get points which will go into your score and this determines how the battles play out. There are three rounds to every mission and after each round, you can fill up half of the [b]heart gauge[/b]. If you max out the [b]heart gauge[/b] you will get a special heart note on round three.  If you hit this note, you will see a special scene at the end of the mission. There also is a [b]Ninja Star Icon[/b] that will give you more points once activated and you can get more points if used. If you miss a note you will lose your streak and have to build it back up similar to most rhythm games.
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2400509089

One thing I did appreciate was the large number of cosmetics that are available in the game, there is a lot to choose from. I enjoyed having the option to dress up the girls how I want them but I should note that they can clip through the character's body depending on their hairstyle.
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2400509773
Now the gameplay is fun and interesting at first as the rhythm elements are done very well but that feeling dulls rather quickly as the game feels very hollow.  It becomes stale and repetitive as you play through the stages over and over again.  

One of the striking low points for me was realizing that there are barely any songs.  For a rhythm game, it’s lacking at a total of 31 songs with none being very good. Typical rhythm games have a large number of songs where you can at least find a good chunk that are really good to listen to. 

To make matters worse, there is nothing really different about arcade and story mode.  Story mode is just arcade mode with some added cutscenes included at the first, fourth, and fifth stage. Also, it does not matter if you win the first or second round, all of it depends on the third round of the mission, if you lose that round you will have to redo the entire mission from the start. It ruins the hard work put into the first two rounds due to missing a few notes in the last round.

Lastly, there is little to no replay value to be had in [b]SKBA[/b].  It doesn't provide anything new or exciting to encourage playing the game again. They could have implemented a multiplayer option which would have helped to keep some life into the game after completing the story mode once, but this is something they did not do.  Even if the online multiplayer was dead, having the ability to compete with friends could have breathed some life into this mostly dull experience.

[h1]Graphics and Performance[/h1]
The graphics are not very impressive.  I know it’s a port from the [b]PS Vita[/b] but I just can’t help but notice the low resolution and some low-quality shots from the characters. The 2D sprites are a little choppy as well and feel odd to look at. The game does run well, and I experienced no issues while playing the game. I tested the game on an NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 3GB, AMD Ryzen 5 1500X Quad-Core Processor 3.50, and 16 GB of RAM. As mentioned earlier in the review the soundtrack is disappointing.

[h1]Final Verdict[/h1]
[b]SKBA[/b] is an interesting idea for a game.  It fits with the wackiness of the [b]SK[/b] series and looks fun on paper, but leaves a lot to be desired and has nothing really special going for it. If you plan on picking up this title, then I recommend you wait for a sale as it can be fun for a few hours, but don’t expect hours worth of content here. The one thing that [b]SKBA[/b] has going for it is the wide selection of cosmetic items, but that’s not really going to make you want to keep playing the game as a whole.

If you want more good quality reviews like this, then feel free to follow [url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/5297658/] Life Needs a Little Sin [/url] for more reviews like this one.

author: {'steamid': '76561199011880090', 'num_games_owned': 167, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 600, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 600, 'last_played': 1609798825}
review:
Many speak of it, but rarely have human mouths ever tasted it: the pinnacle of culinary perfectionthe Super Dish. Few shinobi have ever been able to prepare a dish so exquisite, but legendary shinobi and sushi chef Hanzo thinks that perhaps his students and their rivals are up to the task. He holds a contest to see which of the girls can hone her Ninja Arts best for cooking as opposed to combat. The competition is fierce; the one who presents the old shinobi master with the Super Dish will obtain a Secret Ninja Art Scroll that will make real her most fervent desire. Whosoever can prove her knife to be as suitable for cooking as for combat will emerge the victor, while all her friends and rivals wind up as mere dessert...

A rhythm spin-off of the ninja busty brawler series, SENRAN KAGURA, Bon Appetit! features cooking battles rather than shinobi showdowns, with emphasis on outrageous humor, delicious food, and gratuitous images of the series lovely ladies. This culinary warfare is carried out through an array of rhythm battles, where tapping the correct buttons in time with the beat will rack up combos and determine the size and quality of the resulting dish. The soundtrack consists of a variety of catchy tunes encompassing all genres from jazz to classical, with special Japanese vocal tracks sung by the leader of each faction. This Full Course edition includes all DLC and 22 buxom ninja between the two original PlayStation Vita releases, rewarding players who can overcome the challenge of creating the ultimate Super Dish with a special feast for the eyes as well.

KEY FEATURES:

* Rhythm spin-off of the popular SENRAN KAGURA series
The infamous, voluptuous ninja series ventures into a new genre as all of the bouncy babes from SENRAN KAGURA Burst and SENRAN KAGURA SHINOVI VERSUS return, taking a break from physical combat to make culinary war instead in this tasty yet truly tasteless adventure.

* The Dressing Room returns with even more stylish options
Like other SENRAN KAGURA titles, the Dressing Room makes another appearance with multiple ways to customize characters outfitsbut be careful! Peep too much and you risk the wrath of a full-fledged shinobi

* Three different modes of play plus online leaderboards
Story Mode progresses through the main game, Free Mode allows for customized cooking showdowns, and Arcade Mode includes comprehensive online leaderboards to see how you stack up against your already pretty stacked competition.

* Includes original Hanzo x Crimson Squad, additional Gessen x Hebijo pack, and all additional DLC
Includes both games which were released separately on PlayStation(r)Vita, as well as all DLC in between, now in 1080p resolution and running at 60fps. Collapse

author: {'steamid': '76561198012610010', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 385, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 385, 'last_played': 1529105206}
review:
Senran Kagura: Dekamori (the real, proper name) is definitely a skippable entry in the Senran Kagura series. While it does have a few things that are followed up on in Estival Versus, it's largely irrelevant to the greater plot. Hanzo even says as much in the introduction.

As a side game, it's a very enjoyable one for fans that already played Burst and Shinovi Versus. Like any Senran Kagura game the stories can be both funny and emotional, allowing every character to shine and this time it's done in a cutesy, but extreme cooking duel where shinobi cut at sonic speed and punch ice to crush it. Every character's song is a fun composition for their respective character, oftentimes using parts from their previous themes, and every dish is the character's favorite dish, some of of which are previously established. Daidouji likes giant meals like tuna, Yumi likes cold food like shaved ice and Murasaki likes plain, easily-made packaged food in a funny juxtaposition, for example.

There's not much you can say about a rhythm game's mechanics other than it works. Having two lines at once is like a simplified version of the Theatrhythm system, but on the harder difficulties it can definitely be a sufficient challenge without every feeling unfair.

With good stories, good music, all the initial Vita version's DLC and very excellent optimization that lets this run on virtually anything, I think Senran Kagura: Dekamori is a feel-good game worth getting.

author: {'steamid': '76561197992694498', 'num_games_owned': 2769, 'num_reviews': 450, 'playtime_forever': 1174, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1174, 'last_played': 1607796866}
review:
[h1]Bouncy bouncy nom nom nom[/h1]

Do you like food? Do you like boobs? Do you like music? If your answer to all questions is yes then this game is for you.

This is a pretty simplistic rhythm game with nudity. The goal is simple. You choose a girl and start a food battle. No, not that one where you throw food at each other. None of the food here goes to waste, it gets eaten by an old man. You battle another girl and must prepare a better dish to win. Dish quality depends on how many notes you hit. Each song has three stages, after each stage your opponent lose some of her clothing until she's left completely naked. Of course same could happen to you if you lose.

Gameplay is very simple. Just hit the notes by pressing buttons on your controller. Better don't be distracted by bouncing titties, this would lead to a poor dish and your humiliation being stripped completely.
There are a lot of girls, size A size D, old, young but all of them can cook. And good amount of songs. Some are very easy, most are medium difficulty and few are challenging, especially one song which could drive you mad. Fortunately there are three difficulty levels. I played the whole game on medium and with my slow reaction and being absolutely terrible at rhythm games it was perfect.
You unlock various clothing and can customize each girl's appearance. You can also go to dressing room and stare at their tits to get “Sexual harassment king” achievement.

Graphics are ok...ish. It fells like the game is running at 720p, aliasing everywhere and character models are extremely low resolution. But it's still enjoyable. Oh the most important thing is done well. Tits have physics and they bounce. This alone makes up for bad graphics.

Sound? Well it's a rhythm game so it's supposed to be good. And it is. Most songs are pretty good except for couple of boring ones. There's also the usual anime moaning/squeeking or however you call it.

Definitely not a game for everyone. Those who love anime/hentai won't be disappointed.

[b]Pros[/b]
[list]
[*]Titties
[*]Butts
[*]Lots of sexy clothes
[*]Good variety of songs
[*]Great physics
[*]Girls for everyone's taste
[/list]
[b]Cons[/b]
[list]
[*]Graphics are bad
[/list]
