author: {'steamid': '76561198088392869', 'num_games_owned': 586, 'num_reviews': 68, 'playtime_forever': 216, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 208, 'last_played': 1534937136}
review:
このゲームのレビューを書くのにどれだけの日数を費やしたか。
それほどまでにこのタイトル、いや１つのシリーズもの芸術作品として取り扱いには細心の注意を払うべきだ。

音ゲーというジャンルにおいてタイミングは非常に重要である。
大体のゲームはノーツと呼ばれるものをなるべくピッタリのタイミングで押す。
しかし、このゲームではそれが(少なくとも私には)困難なのだ。

まず、集中できるかね？
たゆんたゆんな女の子が必要以上に薄着な格好で生クリームにまみれているのに、君は音楽と流れ来るアイコンを見続ける事が出来るのか。

とんでもなく忍耐強いか男の子が好き、もしくは「限り無く広がる地平線」が好きならば平然とプレイするだろう。
だが、このゲームを買った(買う予定の)紳士諸君は違う。違う筈なのだ。

揺れる様を目に焼き付けたい、だろう？
求めているのはそういった刺激の筈だ。
人は抗うことを止めると楽になるそうだ、是非そうした方がよい。

そして、しばらく甘い時間を味わった後に気づく筈だ。
こんな事ならプレイ動画で良いじゃないかと。

違う。それは違うのだ同志たちよ。
人がお楽しみ中のものを見て、楽しめるのかね？
自分の手で、タイミングを合わせて「弾ませる」事こそが重要だろう。

少々脱線したがプレイする事が困難な理由のもう１つとして、音楽と画面の同期ズレがある。
これは音ゲーにとっては致命傷となりうる。
某100人対戦のバトル・ロワイアル形式ゲームが動く環境でもズレる。
原因はハイクオリティなモデリングなのかも知れないが、それを突き止める精神的な余裕はない。

上記2点の問題点(いや、少なくとも片方だけは)に関して問題がなければ思う存分に揺らし、観賞してほしい。

さぁ、最高級を召し上がれ！

author: {'steamid': '76561198074548465', 'num_games_owned': 1092, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 1009, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1009, 'last_played': 1517009490}
review:
This game is completely ridiculous, but also a pretty good game. While I like the idea of Rhythm Games, I usually need an interesting conceit to try it out. Turning it into a cooking competiton, a la Food Wars, is that in spades. First off, this is a hard game. You have have two scrolling tracks to pay attention to and (I played this on controller so I don't know how it is with keyboard) you have match both directional inputs and button inputs. The thing is directionals and buttons are colored the same (e.g. left and X are both blue, right and B are pink) so you get a lot of buttons popping up it's very easy to mess up and lose a round you were nailing just a second ago.

Second, the music is awesome. I've been playing this off and on since the Winter sale and those songs just get stuck n my head. My favorite is Murasaki's which goes from chiptune to metal. Another great thing is that you get the whole soundtrack with it to listen to when not playing, pretty good deal.

Oh, and by the way, boobs. Lots of boobs. I think that is the only thing that could drive people away and that's completely understandable. Some of the motives characters have at the start of their story is kinda "wtf" in relation to their appearences, usually the size of their breasts, but by the time you finish the story mode for them, their self-image is iproved to not worry about such things. But most of the stories are just weird fetishes like romantical involved with bean sprouts; wanting to be tempura; and needing long, thick futamaki rolls all the time. 

If you don't care for sexualized content and blatant inneuendos, don't even tempt the though of getting this. If you care or enjoy it, this is a pretty fun game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198324974081', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 504, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 504, 'last_played': 1517644981}
review:
This game is full of the Senran Kagura humour we all know and love, but as a rhythm game, I'd only recommend it to hardcore fans or the genre and serious Senran Kagura fans. I realise I probably just suck at these kinds of games, but I found Normal mode to be way too HARD and Easy mode to be so easy that it's boring.

EDIT: It turns out that Normal mode isn't too hard. Rather, certain characters are way too hard without any logical progression. So, you might face an easy character, then a character who is stupidly hard, followed by another easy character. Furthermore, only the third part of the battle (each stage is split into three parts) actually counts. You could get a perfect score for each of the first two parts, then lose by 1% on the third part and still lose the battle over all.

Despite these problems, I'd still recommend the game to fans of the series. It's still good fun.

review:

✔ Fanservice

author: {'steamid': '76561198046088712', 'num_games_owned': 1467, 'num_reviews': 63, 'playtime_forever': 1811, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1762, 'last_played': 1568610421}
review:
Senran Kagura Bon Appetit is a rhythm cooking spinoff to the normal beat em up style Senran Kagura games. The question is it a good spinoff or one that should be forgotten? After just recently 100% completing the game and getting all the achievements I think it is a yes!

Bon Appetit will be a fun game for those who like rhythm games, Senran Kagura, or just big anime tiddys. A fair warning on the tiddy part since if you try to play this game on hard good luck oodling the ladies while you try to attempt some insane inputs.

One important aspect of rhythm games is if they have good music and I think this game definitely fits the bra. (See what I did there?) My personal favorites are Yagyu's energetic song, Imu's happy and relaxing song, and Haruka's smooth jazzy song. Out of all of the songs the one I did not care much for was my waifu Murasaki's song being that it starts off in 8-bit while the intro sounds like Stand By Me, then goes into a nice italian sounding music (which is probably because you end with making pizza), but then the 3rd part sounds awful music wise in that it stops and goes back into 8-bit but a rock/metal sounding and then ends with italian sounding music again. Other then that they were all really good!

One other complaint I would have is that if you are a completionist there are some achievements that will stress you out and others that will bore you to death. The stressful one is "Finally!" In which you must reach Ninja Arts Lv. 15 which means you must activate your Ninja Art and not miss a single note for a long time. The challenging part is that the only two ways to get this is getting really go at hard mode or grinding Yomi's song on normal until you learn every single note. (I did this and i stayed up all night until 6:00 trying to get this). The boring ones are "Cooking is My Specialty!", "Master of Ninja Arts", and "Happy Cooking." Happy Cooking and Cooking is My Specialty go hand and hand since one required you to hit a cumulative total of 50000 notes while the other requires you to complete 200 songs. Even if you were to do every single character story you would end up with 110 so you need to grind 90 more songs. The other achievement requires you to activate your Ninja Arts 500 times. The problem here is that leveling up your ninja arts doesn't count, so if you were to somehow do perfect on every girls story you would only be a fifth of the way there! The fastest way to get the trinity of boredom done I found out was to do Haruka's song (Since her song is the fastest), grind the song and every time your Ninja Arts fills up activate it immediately and then intentionally miss a note so you can fill up and activate it again, and then repeat this until you have them.

So in conclusion, if you like rhythm games and/or Senran Kagura I would recommend it! But completionists beware for the challenge and boredom.

author: {'steamid': '76561198191807386', 'num_games_owned': 240, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 385, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 332, 'last_played': 1674066578}
review:
Wow. Where to start? Um, well, it's a Senran Kagura game so it's full of hot anime girls, bouncing boobs and butts, which is good. It's all censored though.

The music is decent, the opening song is great and reminiscent of the anime (Ninja Flash!) and the other songs fit in perfectly with the situations at hand.

The gameplay is very standard, just press the arrow keys and W, A, S and D at the right time for rythym and Q to activate special move..

Getting a Perfect Victory feels satisfactory as you are rewarded with a very lewd picture of your opponent.

The game does stay true to the other games in the franchise, using the same cast of characters, costumes and rivalries, excluding Shinobi Reflex (the Switch game).

In conclusion I recommend this game for fans of Senran Kagura, rhythm games and lewd anime games. 4.5/5

author: {'steamid': '76561197969489829', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 325, 'playtime_forever': 168, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 168, 'last_played': 1513967254}
review:
Man am I bad a rhythm games. 
Senran Kagura is a series created by a mad man that no longer requires such mortal needs like water or food. No he can just subsist off the idea of breasts and butts  alone. 
The series revolves around a school of ninjas, a majority of them being women with the exception of one or two minor (I can't put enough emphasis on minor here) characters who happen to be male. But things aren't well for the students of Hanzo Academy because they're constantly attacked by other groups of ninjas. 

But this isn't about that.

Senran Kagura Bon Appetit! Is a cooking based rhythm game set as a side story in the Senran Kagura universe. Hanzo, Asuka's Grandfater, holds a cooking competition because I guess he's hungry. The prize of the competition is a secret ninja scroll that can grant any wish. So all of your favorite Senran Kagura characters compete for the scroll, or in the case of some, for whatever ingredients are left.
I can relate to that, I constantly fight for food. 

Each character has their own story that lasts for about thirty minutes to an hour. Or two hours because I'm bad. The story plays out like a visual novel with two characters just kind of talking to another until the cooking starts. Sometimes they move, sometimes they don't. And in Asuka's case, sometimes they just so happen to have dialogue that is majority a dick joke. I admire her commitment. 

Oh right, this is a rhythm game. 

Anyway, once a battle starts you are greeted by the stage where the two characters cook. Each dish has a separate animation, but you probably won't notice considering you'll be busy matching buttons. You have two rows with a circle at the end. The buttons you need to press roll over as the song starts and you need to match the button as it enters the circle. Don't make the mistake I did and think the bottom row is the opponents buttons, you have to match both circles. 

Its fun, but if you're like me then you're going to screw up a lot, even on normal I was having trouble keeping up with some of the songs.
This game was also a PS Vita game, and you can tell. The character models, while looking nice, and fairly low quality for what you would expect from at least a console port. You can also see the outlines on the model where clothing is going to rip if you pay enough attention.

Also, don't expect to get any kind of cooking ideas from the food they made, considering how low polygonal it is, you're not really going to get hungry playing the game, it certainly aint no Shougeki no Souma in the food porn department. 

There was also this problem where I was starting to wig out playing the game, mostly because the speed and blurriness of the button prompts was messing with my vision. But that was entirely because my monitor is from 1989, I was mostly fixed when I turned down the FPS. 

Its still a fun game, though, I just wouldn't pay full price for it. The game is on sale while I'm writing this review, fourteen fun bucks is a good price. But there are better rhythm games on the market, some of them are even free, so take that as you will. 

Senran Kagura: Bad kitchen hygiene gets six titties on a ninja out of ten. 

Taiko No Tatsujin PC port never. 

[url=http://store.steampowered.com/curator/7124597/]The Dirk Ninja academy. We're not any good but we got spirit! [/url]

author: {'steamid': '76561198382720354', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 294, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 286, 'last_played': 1515423526}
review: I made the mistake last night of getting drunk and checking out the steam sale. And somehow I found myself a proud(?) owner of SK Bon Appetit. And I like it, It's actually really fun. Its everything you love about a SK game (tons of characters, a sense of humor, dress up ya anime girl, and of course the giant anime tiddies falppin around) except its a rhythm game. If you like rhythm games, or if you just like Senran Kagura, I recommend this. Its a very enjoyable game to just sit down and have a chill time.

author: {'steamid': '76561198021303887', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 190, 'playtime_forever': 1288, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 666, 'last_played': 1515678059}
review:
Bon, je vais pas la jouer hypocrite, si j'ai pris le jeu il est clair que c'était un PETIT PEU (xD) pour me rincer l'oeil ! Après, au-delà de l'aspect un peu dénudé des protagonistes, le jeu reste très, très plaisant à jouer.

Les + : 
+ Des boobs, des boobs, des boobs ! Ah et aussi un peu de boobs ! 
+ Certaines musiques pas mal du tout.
+ Un bon jeu de rythme, certaines musiques vous donnerons du fil a retordre.
+ Des boobs !
+ Beaucoup de protagonistes avec chacune leur propre histoire.
+ Beaucoup de contenu à débloquer.
+ Des boobs !
+ Les désserts ! ;)

Les - :
- Les graphismes un peu bof.
- Pas de traductions francaise.

Donc, comme je disais, on va pas se mentir, le jeu se réserve à un public plus ou moins averti, au-delà de l'aspect olé-olé il reste un très bon jeu de rythme donc si voir des filles en petite culotte ne vous répugne pas plus que ca le jeu est une bonne pioche dans son genre.

review: What can I say, It's a fun game with a hefty side of bewbs.  Sadly there isn't much depth to the battles, they are pretty easy to win and unless you really mess up you always win.  Enemy clothes break depending on your ability to string together and score comboes... Each battle is only 2 stages, so there really is no back and forth clothing destuction, its a 2 shot KO.  Anyway, no one is reading this far because I said bewbs earlier... so go forth and have fun.

author: {'steamid': '76561198250118060', 'num_games_owned': 600, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 1397, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1388, 'last_played': 1702839026}
review:
为什么做饭也会爆衣呢…？不然还有什么看点呢！半藏老绅士你怎么看（☆_☆）

这貌似也不是系列第一次尝试音游的玩法了。游戏素材几乎完全沿用了闪乱SV的模型，在角色的肢体动作表现上却进步不小。
为所有角色新写了个人曲目，大都能够听出熟悉的旋律【改编自系列早期作品bgm并串烧】。几位头目角色也有了自己的有词歌曲，音乐体验还凑合【购买游戏会附赠全曲目专辑】。
至于游戏难度…我只能玩玩简单。普通难度有几首歌实在是撑不住副歌部分。困难的话……我认输^=_=^

这是款很普通的粉丝向音游，剧情与主线没有任何关系，无聊玩一玩也是可以的。
另外注意一下两奈个人剧情里的一个关键词！一刷的时候注意到我整个人都不好了_(:_」∠)_

author: {'steamid': '76561198097169049', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 194, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 93, 'last_played': 1573726049}
review:
리듬 게임으로서의 게임성은...
역시 캐릭터빨 게임이기에 좀 그렇군요.

리듬게임으로서 판정이 좀 짭니다.
또한 패드로 하지 않으면 하기 햇갈리게
키배치를 해놔서 하기도 함들고요.

캐릭터가 헐벗는건 좋은데 스테이지를 클리어 할려면
일정 수준이상의 게이지를 유지하는 것이 아니라

한번 유지한 게이지로 한사이클 이기고 다름 사이클로
이런걸 반복해서 모든 사이클을 이기지 않으면 스테이지 클리어가
원활하게 되질 않는데 완벽에 가깝게 클리어해야 함으로

클리어에 상당한 압박이 느껴집니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198334655385', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 259, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 259, 'last_played': 1496994046}
review:
PSV的移植，原本好像是分AB卡的，合到了一起。
整体来讲，曲目的质量还是可以，但是数量就显得有点少了~~~~
普通难度以下就算是音游小白或手残党也能驾驭，不过Hard难度就有些不太友好啦~~~
每种料理大成功之后半藏的恶搞是笑点所在~~~然后还有福利~~~
而且能自动识别PS4手柄或X360手柄，并且会自动改变音符键位，这点还是很棒的，像本人一向是用PS平台打音游，360的X是PS手柄的方块位置，PS的X是360的A键，所以根本没法用360手柄打音游，所以这点设定非常棒~~~~

author: {'steamid': '76561198043642717', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 79, 'playtime_forever': 1526, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1526, 'last_played': 1503824391}
review:
Achievements: All possible.  They're all pretty challenging with none being too tedious.  Fun.  

Pros/Cons:
+ Great music.  It's very catchy and likeable.  Given the replayability of the game, this is a really good thing.  
+ It's a bit like guitar hero in that the button presses follow the melody of the music.  It's not simply metronomic.  
+ The animations are pretty cool-- the characters will actually stir pots or spin cotton candy or stare at a microwave depending on the dish being made.  
+ The judge is hilarious.  
+ The game does not take itself seriously and has some pretty silly plotlines.  
+ The customization system is great.  There are a huge number of costumes-- not just simple recolors either.  There's also accessories that are entirely adjustable in terms of position and size.  That means you can stick a giant lollipop on someone's head or make their entire upper half a giant trout... or something more sensible, I guess.  
+ The notes line up nicely with the music.  It's very satisfying.  
+ Hard mode is challenging yet not overwhelming-- not a crazy mess of button mashing like some rhythm games.  
+ It took me roughly 24 hours to get all the achievements.  Given the replayable nature of a rhythm game, I'd say the price is very worth it.  

-Personally, I had a lot of trouble getting this game to run properly until I checked the discussions for a solution.  When I first booted it up, the framerate was very stuttery.  It was unplayable.  
- Some songs are unproportionately difficult compared to others.  They're challenging even on normal difficulty.  
- The songs are played in three segments, each being a different dish.  My issue is that, to pass a song, the first two segments don't matter in the slightest.  One can literally put their controllers down and fail the first two parts and still be able to win.  Alternatively, they could ace the first two sections then lose because they lost the last part.  It doesn't make much sense.  
- Some of the costumes for larger characters don't scale well for smaller characters making them look sorta nightmarish and odd.  


Overall:
I really love this game.  It's one of the best rhythm games I've played on steam. It reminds me of guitar hero, and I absolutely love that about it.  While it certainly has heaps of fan service and rather... pneumatic characters, that is not what drew me to it.  As a huge fan of rhythm games, I have to say that this game is, well, really fun.  It's got good art, animations, and character customization.  Despite my troubles in running it, I have certainly enjoyed my time with it.  I recommend it to any fan of the more guitar hero-esque rhythm games.

author: {'steamid': '76561198017483501', 'num_games_owned': 299, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 3063, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1399, 'last_played': 1625554172}
review:
A fun rhythm game about cooking where losing causes a characters clothes to fly off.

I've really enjoyed it, having played well past the point where I've stopped getting many new rewards (in the form of outfits and acessories for your characters), which is not something that I do in every game.

The fanservice-y way in which clothes are destroyed isn't really a positive or a negative for me, but I do like putting everyone in cute outfits, inventing my own backstories for them as I go, and seeing them appear on the character even when I'm playing against them as a different character.

There are plenty of songs, and they are all rather good, high quality tracks. I feel that I will likely listen to a few of them even when not playing the game.

The difficulty modes are nice (although the jump from 'medium' to 'hard' took a bit of getting used to) I'm happy that I have been consistantly challenged during my playtime.

Everything in this game is over the top, from the daft storylines to the way your food is judged, it's full of self-aware and overly not self-aware jokes; I don't know how those voice actors managed to keep a straight face.

If you're into games like this, and are willing to buy a game with 24(?) tracks, then I'd highly recommend it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198085551904', 'num_games_owned': 1072, 'num_reviews': 110, 'playtime_forever': 128, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 128, 'last_played': 1499540183}
review:
SENRAN KAGURA Bon Appétit é un videogame musicale, dove ci basterà cliccare i bottoni che vediamo a schermo e goderci po spettacolo in sottofondo.
Il gioco é molto divertente e di sicuro ci farà passare molte ore incollati al pc, tutto questo grazie anche a tutti i contenuti inclusi.
Graficamente non é male, specialmente si nota una cura maniacale proprio sulle belle ragazze protagoniste di questo gioco. Che altro dire? 
Consigliati questo gioco un po' a tutti, è un videogioco speciale, strano, divertente e anche piccante. Che di sicuro vi incollerà per molte ore!

author: {'steamid': '76561198143535943', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 2021, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1089, 'last_played': 1504296194}
review:
+Grill den Henssler the Game nur ohne den Henssler und mit mehr Titten als Ruth Moschner!!+


Wer auf die Girls aus Senran Kagura steht wird an diesem Spiel auf jeden Fall Freude haben!
In diesem Teil liefern sich die gut ausgestatteten Shinobi ihre Kämpfe allerdings anders als sonst in Form von Cook Offs á la Grill den Henssler.

Der geniale Ecchi-Humor der Serie ist auch in diesem Spin-Off in großem Maße vorhanden und man sollte sich wortwörtlich darauf vorbereiten die hübschen Shinobi Schülerinnen auf dem Silbertablett serviert zu bekommen.
Der Artstyle und das Voiceacting sind wie immer in der Serie auf höchstem Level angesiedelt!

Was man dazu sagen muss: Es ist alt nur ein kleines Spin-Off Game zur Senran Kagura Reihe (im Original auf der PS Vita erschienen) in Form eines Rhythm Games! 
Bedeutet: Witzige Dialoge und (nicht ganz ernst zu nehmende) Mini Stories, Tasten in der richtigen Reihenfolge drücken und sich dann nach erfolgreichem Abschluss die Belohnung reinziehen (Fanservice ist wie immer bei Senran Kagura garantiert!)

Die Songs sind okay bis sehr gut! Die Schwierigkeit ist allerings nicht ganz ohne und schon der Sprung von 'Easy' zu 'Normal' macht enormen viel unterschied. (Selbst das Battle gegen Charakter Rin ist auf 'Easy' schon deutlich schwerer als der Rest). Außerdem sollte man das Spiel mit einem Controller spielen, weil das Gameplay eindeutig darauf ausgelegt ist. Dieses Spiel mit der Tastatur zu spielen kann man meiner Meinung nach vollkommen knicken!

Kurz gesagt: wenn man auf Ecchi Anime Humor steht wird man hier auf jeden Fall gut bedient. Weniger Gameplay als in der Hauptreihe aber super für Kerle wie mich die von Kasturagi, Homora, Hibari, Asuka, Ryona und co. nicht genug bekommen können!

author: {'steamid': '76561198214357552', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 1521, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1138, 'last_played': 1513254283}
review:
As this is a Senran Kagura game, I already knew I was going to love the game, and wondered to myself what I was getting myself into. But I found Senran Kagura Bon Appetit to be a really fun rhythm game. There is a wide array of characters you can select from (aka the roster from Shinovi Versus), so you can enjoy cook-offs with your favorite against everyone else. There are three main modes in Bon Appetit: Story Mode, Arcade Mode, and Free Mode.

The story in this game involves a cook-off competition, with the prize being a Secret Ninja Scroll that can grant its user any wish that she may desire. It works the same way as it did in the previous entries: Shinovi Girls' Hearts stories. You play through each characters' stories and find out what they wanted. I really enjoyed playing most of their stories because some are quite hilarious.

The songs that you play depend on who your opponent is, which I think is fine both in Story and Arcade Modes; but I wish that you could pick whichever song you wanted to play in Free Play. But I understand that the songs are to match each of the characters. Some of the songs in this game are good, and some are mediocre. For the mediocre ones, they were pleasant to listen to, but not fun to play because those songs tend to be the somewhat slow songs; and I gotta go fast.

Gameplay-wise, it's fun for a rhythm game, just simply press the corresponding button or key at the right time to get the most out of it, and activate Ninja Arts for maximum power. The little "specials" that occur during a song is distracting if you're someone like me who takes getting perfect scores seriously, but this is Senran Kagura, and we should always expect stuff like that.

The Dressing Room and the Library remain, and operate the same way as the main titles; and everything is unlocked simply by playing the game (there's no store like in the previous titles). If there is one big thing that I would have to complain about the most, it's that there's no multiplayer functionality. This should've been a feature because I want to play online against my friends and against other people around the globe. The only online feature available in the game is Leaderboards.

But overall, I recommend Senran Kagura Bon Appetit to people who like rhythm games and can deal with the theme of Senran Kagura, but I definitely recommend this game to any Senran Kagura fan. (8.5/10)

author: {'steamid': '76561198062358517', 'num_games_owned': 242, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 274, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 274, 'last_played': 1488128248}
review:
[i]Bon Appétit![/i] is one of those games that exclusively target existing fans of the series, and it [i]does[/i] adequately welcome them with series tradition of goofy dialogues and over-the-top theatrics that prove entertaining - for a while.

But beneath those comes some seriously shallow and repetitive gameplay that could keep even the most fanatical rhythm game fans away. Almost every element in the game sees excessive reuse. That leaves just fan service to be the only real reward for putting up with everything, but even that screams laziness.

author: {'steamid': '76561198295838756', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 209, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 203, 'last_played': 1517697878}
review:
Elements I liked:
Graphics
Music
Large selection of unique characters each with their own story
Vast array of customization options
Fast-paced and challenging gameplay
Anime Tiddies
The judge is hilarious, especially when you cook a Super Dish
Lots of sex jokes
3 different game modes
Many extras to unlock from completing the game with different characters

Elements I felt mixed about:
The Dressing Room has a feature that is borderline r.a.p.e
Doesn't use W or the up key

Elements I disliked:
Censored, no actual nudity
Only Singleplayer

I am really enjoying this so far, it is much more than just viewing sexy anime girls, it actually has really enjoyable gameplay and top quality humor. The stories for each character are entertaining and well-written, so it's fun to play through the game multiple times to experience each character's unique story.  I'll give it a 8/10.

author: {'steamid': '76561198084941710', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 72, 'playtime_forever': 1225, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1225, 'last_played': 1496153869}
review:
7/10

闪乱神乐又一次刷新了下限，这款游戏距离R18只有一步之遥了。

从玩法上来说是一款音乐节奏游戏但说实话单纯从游戏性上来讲并不好玩，首先个人感觉音乐都不是很好听，玩法上也没有什么新意，节奏感也一般，玩起来并不是很有意思，普通难度来说游戏还是非常简单的，游戏的重复度非常高，中途非常容易腻。不过这些都不是问题，毕竟游戏本身也不是以游戏性为卖点的，大家都懂的。

所以说，如果你是抱着某些不可描述的原因去玩这款游戏的话，这游戏一定不会让你失望的。不过如果你单纯的想找一款音乐游戏，那这款游戏可能并不适合你。

顺便说一句xbox的手柄玩这类游戏真难用。。。。

author: {'steamid': '76561198022899795', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 144, 'playtime_forever': 4204, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1836, 'last_played': 1660240373}
review:
O game é um spin-off da série, diferente dos jogos originais, esse é um game de música/cozinha/sacanagem, as garotas tem o objetivo de cozinhar e para isso você tem que tocar as músicas no tempo certo, caso você fique errado demais, você vai perdendo a batalha e a roupa também, no final você pode ficar completamente nua, caso faça uma batalha perfeita, no final você pode ver a garota num prato em posição constrangedora, traduzindo é Senran Kagura caramba, tem sacanagem, no jogo você pode mudar tudo nas garotas, por exemplo cabelo, roupa, roupa íntima e acessórios, o game é divertido.
Agora falando se vale a pena, esse game foi lançado para o Ps Vita e ai portado para o PC, e como de costume chegou todo cagado no PC, eu nem vou comentar sobre isso, a maioria dos problemas já foram corrigidos, mas ainda existe um, você jogar o game e não abre as conquistas normalmente, para que elas sejam contadas na sua conta, você tem que sair do jogo, ai todas que você abriu aparecem, isso é chato porque caso você ganhe 3 e saia completamente do game, as 3 ficaram com o mesmo horário de registro, infelizmente não arrumaram isso e nem vão arrumar.
Bem agora vou falar sobre os controles, esse jogo é bem completo, nele você pode jogar no teclado, no controle de xbox 360 e também no controle de PS3, eu tentei com o de PS4 mas não funcionou direito, eu segui o tutorial de uma pessoa aqui da steam e fiz funcionar o de PS3 com o drive oficial da Sony, ficou uma beleza, inclusive as notas dentro do jogo ficam com o layout do PS3 mesmo e isso ajuda.
Bom a conclusão é simples, o game vale sim a pena, você vai jogar horas e horas, ele falta um modo online, mas mesmo assim vale a pena, já que tem muita coisa para fazer, caso ele estejam em promoção vale ainda mais.

author: {'steamid': '76561198350953962', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 62, 'playtime_forever': 1289, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1289, 'last_played': 1493869738}
review: This game is almost kind of like Huniepop if the fanservice was cranked up to eleven! Much like how the addicting Candy Crush style of Huniepop proved successful, so does the addictive rhythm style of this game. Even in the easiest mode there is still some challenge to be had and with every charater you face having different levels of difficulty to their beats, it allows you a clever way to try and predict how hard earned your victory might be. I will be perfecty honest though, all the characters are basicallly stereotypes and are played more for humour than actual relatability, but the "special reward" you get for having these characters duel is not dissapointing.

author: {'steamid': '76561198062077590', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 1393, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1140, 'last_played': 1491961618}
review:
~Ooh-La-La~

Senran Kagura Bon Appétit is a foray by XSeed and Marvelous into a new genre for the game series. Bon Appétit can best be described as a rhythm game much in the same vein as Guitar Hero. You play as one of the Hanzo/Gessen/Hebijo/Crimson Squad girls who is cooking and competing against a fellow Shinobi. Your goal is to maintain your rhythm with the songs and make amazing dishes. The game features the same wild antics that are present in Shinovi and Estival, while also treating us to some comedy + saucy gold. 

[u]Positives[/u]
+ Some rocking songs! - There are some really catchy songs here that are worth your listening. 
+ Laugh out loud moments - Comedy gold here folks. Especially the Hanzo interjections.
+ Fanservice galore - Bon Appétit doesn't hold back on what it's known for.
+ Some replayability - Easy/Medium/Hard difficulty help keep the game from stagnating. 

[u]Negatives[/u] 
- Limited number of songs! - Only 22 songs. Eventually gets to be repetetive over a long period of time.
- Difficulty Restrictions - Normal feels too easy... Hard feels way too difficult for me. Can leave you stuck.
- Aged graphics - Character sprites are not the smoothest... some cut-off edges on curves. 

In any case, I enjoyed Bon Appétit for everything it provided. Go ahead and purchase it at full price if you're an avid fan. If you're in any way unsure, I'd suggest waiting for a discount.

author: {'steamid': '76561198047270545', 'num_games_owned': 6317, 'num_reviews': 251, 'playtime_forever': 1184, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1184, 'last_played': 1490130802}
review: I was blown away by this game, but struggled when trying to come up with the best possible criteria to use for rating it. Eventually, I came to a conclusion, and the result was the most comprehensive review ever attempted for this game - https://www.youtube.com/edit?o=U&video_id=u1osbW3o0Ds

author: {'steamid': '76561198031881545', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 273, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 190, 'last_played': 1561218620}
review:
まだ数時間しかプレイしてませんがこっから先は多分あまり変わりが無いかと思ったのでレビューします。

ちなみに僕は原作は一切知りません。
前作(?)のSENRAN KAGURA SHINOVI VERSUSをプレイしてた為、購入に至ったって感じです。
スピンオフタイトルという事もあって、原作を知らなくても
お気に入りのキャラが見つかればそれだけで救われると思います。

感想は他レビューにある通り、おっぱい祭りです。その一言に尽きます。

音ゲー的には音ゲーをやった事ない方でも楽しめるかなといった感じです。
ちなみに僕はPS脳のせいで、XBoxコントローラー表示にまったく慣れておらず
あろうことか、音ゲー勢なのにも関わらずまともにクリア出来ません。

まともにクリア出来ないのもあって、最も売りである乳揺れとか
まったく目に入りません...。

きっと皆さんは楽しめるんじゃないでしょうか。

author: {'steamid': '76561198164275986', 'num_games_owned': 176, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 918, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 707, 'last_played': 1549778593}
review:
每個角色有專屬的配樂，這一點還滿讚的。其中最喜歡焰的歌曲，已經被洗腦了。
手指不靈活的就用搖桿，像我使用搖桿難易度就降低很多。
成就不難，很容易解開，但要注意的就是施展忍法。施展時通常都會被影響到，自亂陣腳。

通關判定有點奇怪，每首歌曲有三輪節奏，似乎只要最後一輪打通就能夠通關，而且就算前兩輪打超好，最後一輪稍有差池將會失敗。有點像綜藝節目，通常都是最後的遊戲得分最多那樣。

不得不說，繁體中文萬歲！！

author: {'steamid': '76561198189767028', 'num_games_owned': 154, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 1883, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 693, 'last_played': 1591634868}
review:
I have enjoyed all of the Senran Kagura games released thus far.
But this one is BY FAR my favorite. Everything about it is so exciting to play. It is a great waste of time!

All of the music fits the characters perfectly! And the music itself is fantastic! The gameplay is just plain fun!
Any fan of rythm games will find themselves at home. Some of the songs on normal are even difficult, so mastering this game is a worthy goal. 
I can't say enough how much fun this one is!

The graphics are fitting in style even though they aren't perfect. And while it can feel sometimes the first 2 segments of a song aren't exactly important, they low key get you really pumped for beating a song against a character you're struggling to beat! 

Some of the characters are easy but some are tough. The variety in each musical tone and difficulty to match it is very well done.

author: {'steamid': '76561197977326723', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 299, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 299, 'last_played': 1490345950}
review:
If you're not interested in innuendo, whether it be in dialogue or food form, stay away from this game.  Because it is HEAVY here.  And of course, it's a Senran Kagura game, so clothes will be flying off the girls, with the usual censorship.

That being said, this is a rhythm game, where you press the scrolling buttons as they appear.  Being set in the Senran Kagura universe, this game is about a nonsense food tournament where the girls compete against each other to attain a scroll that would grant whatever wish they so desire.  Why would such a powerful item be up for grabs in a mere cook-off?  Because this is silly.  Heck, the game says so itself.

Each 'match' has three stages.  Whoever has the upper hand in each stage, the losing girl has parts of their clothes blasted off.  I think you know where this goes.  Especially when you perfect a girl.  Perfecting gives you a scene where the losing girl is 'served' with fruit as a dessert, wearing nothing but chocolate and whipped cream in certain places.  And then you can perv on them.  And since this is a SK game, you are able to unlock outfits and dress up the girls however you see fit.  Want to make them all wear the same outfit?  Go for it.  Make them wear as least as possible so that the clothes being torn off doens't really matter?  Whatever floats your boat.

The music is pretty good, as it has to be in a rhythm game.  In my opinion, the best one is Miyabi's, "Machiavellism of Despair."  Seriously, go look that one up.  

There are differences in the difficulties, with easy being simple, but the other ones have you doing complex combinations.    This rhythm game has two tracks of scrolling buttons for you to... well, keep track of, requiring you to be really good at multitasking.  You got basic stuff.  Press button, mash button, hold button, etc.  It doesn't take long to understand.

Since it's a silly premise, the story is pretty non-existant here, just the girls wanting to fulfil their desires being the driving force.

For the price, this isn't too bad.  If you're a Senran Kagura fan, you'll probably pick it up.  If you're a fan of rhythm games, it might appeal to you.  If you're a perv, you already bought the game.

You could do a lot worse for thirty dollars.

author: {'steamid': '76561198115599979', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 134, 'playtime_forever': 207, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 167, 'last_played': 1657110010}
review:
일단 이 단어를 외치고 시작한다. 졸라 갓갓겜!
역시나 슴란 카구라답게 폭유가 엄청나다. 그리고 리듬게임이다보니 무쌍류 액션 게임이던 본작의 원래 스토리를 모르더라도 충분히 플레이해도 된다는 점이 장점! 또 다른 장점이라면 리듬게임일지언정 슴란 카구라 클라스는 어디 가지 않아서 폭유! 폭유! 폭유!
추가로 한국어화 되어 있으니 영어 울렁증이나 일어가 어려운 사람들도 충분히 스토리를 알 수 있다.(사실 이 게임은 스토리가 중요하지않다?!) 그리고 폭유!
또한 의상실이 있어 그곳에서 옷을 갈아입히고 장신구도 낄 수 있는데 옷을 갈아입혀둔 캐릭이 적으로 나오면 내가 입혀둔 상태로 나온다 싱기방기 그리고 또한 폭유가 엄청나다!

(이 게임이 왜 양손 플레이인지 이해가 안간다면 이 게임은 원래 PS 비타의 게임을 스팀으로 이식해 온것이니 그러려니 할것)

마지막으로 궁금하지 않을테지만 작성자는 빈~평유파다!!

review:
Game is oppa.. i mean good...

My only complain is my wireless xbox360 didn't work

author: {'steamid': '76561198305191644', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 610, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 599, 'last_played': 1512756680}
review:
>Played Asuka because noob
>Oh hey looks like im doing fine
>Faces Daidoji
>Wrecked at sudden level spike and can't even finish the first story
>Keep on playing and practicing
>Finished first story
>Got better and tried hard mode
>Holy Sh*t it's hard
>Perfect victory a song in hard just to see the boobs

10/10 would face sudden level spike for the sake of boobs but PLOT TWIST it was Mirai! You think I wanted to see big PLOT nope I wanted FLAT CHESTS

As a rhythm game this game isn't so bad. It's like Shokugeki no Soma just lacks variety in food testers. The hard mode is really hard but the game is very forgiving on mistakes. As someone who grew in playstation the xbox prompt was difficult to adjust since the X is blue and the A is green so old habits and keep on pressing wrong buttons. As for music, when there's no singing my favorite are the traditional japanese sounding like since they remind me of Okami, in other words the music is actually good! Haven't played every song yet but I like most of the songs so far. Also I can't seem to use x360ce properly so I have to re-config some buttons on the settings menu. For bugs, you need to set task manager to single core processor since it has bad compatibility with multi-threading otherwise it will lag/de-sync on the songs

Overall 8/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198090382657', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 55, 'playtime_forever': 45, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 36, 'last_played': 1550163702}
review:
Imagine Guitar Hero and the most pervy anime with buxom anime babes you can think of were tossed in a blender with a bit of Iron Chef tossed in. This is what you'd get.

Senran Kagura: Bon Appetit - Full Course is basically a rhythm game in a similar style as Guitar Hero but with a twist. You're determining the quality of a cooking contest between two anime girls (each of them with generous jiggle physics). There are three rounds per match, the first two pretty much just helps to strip off yours or your opponent's clothes (depending on whose score is lower) while the third determines the victor. The rhythm section is divided into two bars that require the usual timed button presses. I recommend playing with an XBox 360 controller just for easier gameplay.

There is no complete nudity in this game. You're limited to only stripping your opponents down to their underwear, which in some cases just means a pair of pasties and very stringy bikinis.

There are also some rather...suggestive alternate costumes that the girls can wear, such as a squid that's wrapped around them...yep...you read that right.

The game still has much of Senran Kagura's trademark humor, initially starting out with a serious sounding monologue by Hanzo, who's your steriotypical pervy old man with more than enough power he can get away with it. The monologue sounds serious but then he breaks the charade. From what I've played of it, the game is a fairly decent rhythm game. There are unlocks such as voice sets, videos and images, and...lingere for the girls. But it's still a good casual rhythm game if you're looking for one that delivers both cooking and stripping anime babes...again, with the generous jiggle physics.

author: {'steamid': '76561197996061036', 'num_games_owned': 246, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 454, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 454, 'last_played': 1606698207}
review:
Игра хорошая, для фанатов серии - великолепная, однако:
1) Игра часто фризит. Учитывая, что это ритм-гейм, играть очень некомфортно.
2) В один прекрасный момент я перестал получать достижения! Как оказалось, сломался мой файл с сохранениями, пришлось начинать игру с начала. Сейчас надеюсь, что дважды такого не случится!
3) Прошла куча времени с момента релиза на ПК, а нормальных запрлаток и баг фиксов так и нет (и не будет судя по всему).

Был бы нормальный порт, все было бы идеально. Однако разрабы решили, что и так сойдет.

author: {'steamid': '76561198002971479', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 295, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 295, 'last_played': 1485494707}
review:
You don't... You don't REALLY need a review for this, do you? You're here to play a generic rhythm game and stare at animay tiddies. But whatever:

SENRAN KAGURA Bon Appetits is a big goofy pile of cutesy Japanese music, subpar port, and low-resolution 3D modelled butts. It's fine if you came here just to play a rhythm game, but if you follow Senran for the plot, you're already gone and I can't help you.
On a strictly technical note, the game does have a few issues, like the somewhat frequent lags that throw all the button presses out of sync and greatly niggle my rhythm game tisms. Also, it's a very obvious port, and I hope you have a gamepad, otherwise navigating some of the menus, like the dressing room (You knew it was there), is a complete cast-iron motherfu­cker of an ordeal.
I'd probably give the game a 4/5, and does an overall good job of being your typical rhythm game with a heaping helping of Plot.

author: {'steamid': '76561197966527290', 'num_games_owned': 3794, 'num_reviews': 473, 'playtime_forever': 103, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 73, 'last_played': 1489532210}
review:
Je vous avais déjà parlé de la saga des Senran Kagura en vidéo. Érotique, suggérant toutes les poses les plus sexy/vulgaires en fonction du regard que vous poserez sur ces filles qui sont au centre du jeu, Senran Kagura est surtout un jeu de baston un peu bête où chaque coup violent déshabille un peu la combattante. Cette fois par contre, on nous propose un tout autre style : il s’agit d’un concours de cuisine se jouant en rythme sur une musique, façon Dance Dance Revolution à l’horizontale et sur deux niveaux seulement… Mais avec le même principe de vêtements qui se déchirent entre chacun des trois rounds que composent un niveau.

Et comme pour Senran Kagura, cet épisode n’est pas foncièrement mauvais : le rythme est réussi, les musiques sont sympathiques (même si elles ne proposent rien de vraiment emballant) et on se prête très facilement au jeu. Maintenant, il va falloir réussir à passer outre (sauf si c’est votre truc) les scènes complètement dérangeantes où les filles du jeu se retrouvent nues, avec de la chantilly et du chocolat fondu partout sur le corps, comme ultime récompense d’une chanson terminée avec au moins 99% des notes réussies. Chaud. Au fil des réussites, on débloque alors de nouveaux vêtements, des fond d’écran et autres douceurs gênantes/sexy.

La version PC pose aussi quelques soucis : ne jouez pas trop avec la résolution d’écran sous peine de devoir redémarrer votre bécane pour cause d’écran noir. L’interface Steam intégrée fait aussi sauter le HUD du jeu et globalement, la modélisation des personnages est cassée à de nombreux endroits avec ce portage. Moins vous mettez d’aliasing, par ailleurs, mieux se portent les modélisations. Enfin, si vous aimez la série et les jeux de rythme, c’est sympathique. Mais pas sûr que cela mérite d’y mettre 30 €. Quant à ceux qui trouvent Hatsune Miku dérangeant pour son mode « maison de poupée », n’osez même pas jeter un œil sur ce titre.

author: {'steamid': '76561198004473143', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 68, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 68, 'last_played': 1479180519}
review:
If you've ever played a rhythm game before? Avoid.

It's an okay concept but it seems counter intuitive. If you're here for the eye-candy, you're going to be watching the screen too much with all of the button inputs (though there are in-between/post game moments).

I, however, tried it for the gameplay and was utterly disappointed. None of the characters play differently and there's no modifier to gameplay, other than how well the computer does against you. So, if you're mildly competent at following directions in time, this'll be a cakewalk to a boring degree. 

If none of the above bothers you: go for it if you like non-canonical character interactions and gag-boobs.

review:
Mais dificil do que parece ! 
Ja jogaram DDR ? Agora poe alguns elementos de Guitar Hero e soma ninjas peitudas
puff, o gameplay é esse , uma combinação de 8 comandos ( controle) , que dependendo do ritmo pode ser facil ou insanamente dificil
em cada batalha da cozinha vc prepara 3 pratos, e a cada WIN a oponente perde uma parte da roupa, com bonus pra scores altos ( zoom na bunda, nas teta ) e o especial com a garota no banana split 
tem muuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuitos sets de roupas pra desbloquear e personalizar as garotas 
varias piadas internas nos dialogos, e muitos trocadilhos pervertidos 
Minori melhor garota 
só cuidado pra nao ser preso

review: 겨울 연휴 세일에 섬란카구라 시노비 비너스와 함께 구매했습니다. 사실 이 게임이 리듬겜인 것 조차 생각못했습니다. 동영상 볼 때는 뭔가 요리만드는 게임인 줄 알았더니 진행은 리듬겜이더군요. 그냥 정~말 가볍게 즐기는 게임인 것같습니다. 저도 정가주고는 못사겠네요. 솔직히 엄격 진지 근엄하게 리듬게임으로서 평하자면 많이 부실합니다. 뭐 애초에 격투게임이였으니 그냥 그러려니 합니다. 그 외에 사실상 부가컨텐츠의 전부인 옷입히기는... 좋네요 좋습니다. 결론은 시노비 비너스나 다른 게임 빡겜하고 쉴 때 하는 용도로 적당합니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198060628914', 'num_games_owned': 681, 'num_reviews': 168, 'playtime_forever': 690, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 690, 'last_played': 1481782752}
review:
『デカ盛り 閃乱カグラ』
マーベラスによる人気シリーズ『閃乱カグラ』のスピンオフ作品。日本語あり。

アクションゲームの本編シリーズとは違い、音ゲー。
難易度は三段階で変更できるので、音ゲー苦手な人でも安心なバランス。

シリーズ最大のウリである個性豊かなキャラたちはSHINOVI VERSUSより総員20名(+α)全員続投で、
しかも全員に個別のテーマ曲付き、
さらに一部のキャラ(飛鳥・焔・雪泉・雅緋・大道寺先輩・凛)は中の人によるボーカル付き。

ストーリーは本編のようなシリアス展開は皆無でひたすらお馬鹿なノリで突っ走っていく。
「どんな願いでも叶う秘伝忍法書」が賞品の料理大会で優勝を目指すのだが
参加目的が「もやしへの愛を取り戻す」「おっぱいハーレムを作る」「副賞の余った食材目当て」「天ぷらになる」（！？）等ひどいものばかり。
審査員である半蔵のミスター味っ子張りのオーバーリアクション、
料理対決なのになぜか負けた相手の服が破けていく（最後は全裸までいき女体盛りされる）というのも見所。

ゲームとしては悪くないと思うが、閃乱カグラシリーズのファンディスク的な要素が強いゲーム。
なのでこれをやるなら他の閃乱カグラシリーズ、特にSteamでも販売している
[url=store.steampowered.com/app/411830/]『閃乱カグラ SHINOVI VERSUS』[/url]を先にプレイすることを強くオススメします。

author: {'steamid': '76561198058156743', 'num_games_owned': 1675, 'num_reviews': 88, 'playtime_forever': 625, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 531, 'last_played': 1558948798}
review:
So, we were given a Senran Kagura spin-off and that is a rhythm game about busty highschool girls trying to win some scroll that grants any one wish by having a cook-off. I would have prefered one of the main entries to the series, but I suppose if you have any thoughts of getting this game, I might as well attempt to give this review a bash. 

First off, this is a PS Vita port so the texture quality is unsurprisingly poor, but otherwise it functions just like what I expect from a PC port with a decent selection of 16:9 resolution options, rebindable keys, volume sliders, and of course, runs at 60fps with no technical issues to point out as far as I can tell. Honestly what surprised me the most was in game looking at the button prompts for each note and it actually gives me keyboard prompts according to what I have bound at the time. Why did it even surprise me in the first place? I guess most Japanese ports usually gives you generic gamepad button prompts forcing you to guess which keys did the developers arbitrarily assigned.

There are 3 modes of play which are mostly the same thing, being free mode, arcade mode, and story mode. Free mode is just one song where you pick your waifu and your opponent of choice which determines the song that’s going to be played, while story mode is just picking one character and read through the story with 6 opponents within each playthrough that spans around 30 minutes and the arcade mode is basically the same thing but without the story elements. With that being said, there are only 22 songs in the entire game with 3 levels of difficulty so whether that’s enough variety is entirely up to you.

Level completion is a little bit weird in the sense that it’s not based on how well you did percentage wise, but is mostly dependant on a domination meter that’s fairly unforgiving with each song separated into 3 segments with the first 2 segments being completely irrelevant to beating the song. In fact, it is still possible to get an A rank if you nearly flawless the third segment, it’s just that if you don’t bother to try to flawless the entire song, you will miss out on Grandpa Hanzo’s sporadic fantasies and the sexy bonus at the end.

I will recommend this game on the mere basis of it being a good PC port and a solid rhythm game to sink a bit of time into, so if you like Senran Kagura and/or you like big anime racks, then this game is a good pick up for you.

author: {'steamid': '76561198201768386', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 388, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 313, 'last_played': 1681020239}
review:
Dont Look at me with those eyes, its just a cooking battle....

but in all seriousness, i like how the series kinda surprised us with a button Rhythm Game that is actually really enjoyable, you get to play as almost all of your favorite characters from the Senran Kagura Franchise, with Hanzo being the Judge,  Being Perfect never felt so rewarding in this game, not only do you get a special  bonus at the end, you also get to see hanzo doing hilarious things as he eats his food. like sailing off into space from the middle of the ocean on a sandwhich ship....im serious. it happened. 

what makes this game difficult is trying to stay focused! there are so many distractions...(you'll find out what i mean)  and if you fail on the third round you lose, doesnt matter how well you did on the first or second, which i find that weird. but it does give a challenge, and thats good. just makes winning that much more rewarding.

Now If you'll Excuse me, i gotta prove that im the best cook.

;)

author: {'steamid': '76561197987485219', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 1679, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 993, 'last_played': 1603591121}
review:
This is a pretty good PC port. Some textures are kind of blurry, but I appreciate how everything animates so fluidly at 60 fps.

DLC's are all included, such as costumes, accessories and characters (which have their own tracks). 
The storymode is structured similarly to Street Fighter, where you battle your way up to your rivals haha.

Overall, 9/10 enjoyment.

review:
Este game é um spinoff, um game de ritmo musical, ao melhor estilo de dance dance, mas fazendo uma janta e tanto, diga lá meu velho Hanzo. 
As adoradas ninjas retornam para duelar e conquistar o Ninja Scroll que lhes concedem um desejo (algumas têm um desejo bastante caliente heheh), enfim os 4 clan estão aqui para "duelarem entre si". 
É um jogo onde você foca mais em outras cenas do que a propria música, eu já errei muitas vezes, mas não erro um especial :D
Enfim as músicas são ótimas como sempre e as personagens adoráveis, principalmente Haruka.

author: {'steamid': '76561198123236969', 'num_games_owned': 3530, 'num_reviews': 69, 'playtime_forever': 292, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 291, 'last_played': 1480987470}
review:
SENRAN KAGURA Bon Appétit!  -  це спінофф серії ігор про дівчат ніндзя, в якій основний акцент ставився на цікавий геймплей та нідмірно виражену сексуальність. І ця гра цілковито наслідує даній філософії, тут затягуючий геймплей в якому постійно хочеться стати кращим, і досхочу різних героїнь =)

Почнемо з того що ця серія ігор до нас прямує з PS Vita тому на графоній розраховувати не доводиться, але як це часто буває гра виглядає приємно і доволі стилізовано.

В грі на нас чекає величезна кількість героїнь котрі з певних причин (у кожної своя) попадають на турнір Супер-страви, де вони будуть змагатись за право здійснити абсолютно будь яку свою мрію, за допомогою готування різних страв.
Історія кожної героїні не така вже і довга, але як я казав вище кожна з них індивідуальна, тому в грі більше 20 так званих сюжетів.
Сама гра це ритм-клікер, тобто нам потрібно натискати певні кнопки по мірі їх появлення на екрані, звучить просто, але на рівні складності вище "простого" це зовсім не так, тому це класна гра для підвищення навичок гри на контролері =) 
Різноманітної музики в грі доволі багато, за час що я награв мелодії не повторювались, тому гра не повинна надоїдати.

Варто мати на увазі що в грі присутня тільки японська озвучка, і різні, включаючи англійські, субтитри. Багатьом це буде до вподоби, тому що японські озвучки надміру емоційні, що викликає приємну посмішку =)

З головних претензій до гри в мене лише одне, як можна було в грі про готування страв, де пишуть назву страви яку ми будемо готувати на початку раунду, і показують вигляд страви під час того коли нас судять, як можна не добавити рецепти цих самих страв, це просто втрачена можливість.

З другим пунктом сексуальністю, у гри теж все чудово, дівчата доволі різні, і в грі є цікаві способи "взаємодії" з дівчатами в меню та роздягалці, звичайними дотиками мишки по дівчатам, це викликає в них цікаву реакцію та веселі репліки =)
Щодо кастомізації вигляду, то вибір дуже широкий, за кожну перемогу ми будемо відкривати 1-2 вбрання, і декілька видів білизни та аксесуарів, тількі фантазія буде межею =)

В цілому незважаючи на ваші мотиви покупки гри вона не повинна розчарувати, чи ви купуєте заради геймплею, чи заради сексуальності героїнь. А отже із завданням гра впоралась. Особисто я грав її із своєю дівчиною і в нас були моменти де ми добряче посміялись =)

Можливо і не за фулпрайс, але гру можу рекомендувати!

Ледь не забув, відео геймплею
https://youtu.be/sU-anep323Y

author: {'steamid': '76561198003880781', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 1791, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 321, 'playtime_at_review': 844, 'last_played': 1712316575}
review:
The game's plot is as full as the girls' bras and their backstories are as uplifting as their skirts. It's Senran Kagura, you don't really need more story explaination other than that.

As far as a rhythm game goes, the timing is very forgiving compared to other titles like Sega's Project Diva games. The player even has access to a power up that evens the odds if they hit enough notes. On normal difficulty, there were only a couple of songs that took me a couple of tries to perfect.

Aside from that, Bon Appetit is worth checking out if you're a fan of fanservice or just the absurdity that is the Senran Kagura series. Playstation DS4 controllers work for the game without the need for other programs which is a nice bonus.

author: {'steamid': '76561198084804302', 'num_games_owned': 1474, 'num_reviews': 57, 'playtime_forever': 374, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 15, 'last_played': 1582936190}
review:
Coming from the perspective of someone who plays a lot of rythme games, don't buy this.
1.) Even on hard the game is incredibly easy. So it's a good starting point for casual players.
2.) It crashes. Frequently.

Really, the only selling point is that its Senran Kagura.

author: {'steamid': '76561198033668061', 'num_games_owned': 1119, 'num_reviews': 39, 'playtime_forever': 2398, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2318, 'last_played': 1651831279}
review:
Thank you for porting Bon Appetit! I'm a fan of rhythm games and appreciative of good port!

Time for an actual review!
[i]SENRAN KAGURA Bon Appetit![/i] is a rhythm game with fanservice.

You rhythmically press the correct buttons along the music (some are catchy) and your rival get clothes damage. Get perfect victory and you'll be rewarded with [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=797331060]the ultimate dish[/url]. Ready to be served!

For game difficulty, 3 options available; easy for genuinely enjoying the scene, normal for casual play with some tapping buttons, hard for testing your concentration and focus!

For game modes, there are Story Mode which tells the story about why the girls entered the cooking tournament; Arcade Mode to play 6 battles and gather points for your rank in leaderboards; Free Mode where you play freely with an opponent of your choice, and of course the trademarked Dressing Room for playing Barbie. (well not really a gamemode but still)

For port quality, fps limit can be set to 30 or 60, supports up to 1080 resolution, borderless fullscreen, and 8x AA.

There are still some bugs like [strike]controller rebinding[/strike], [strike]achievement issues[/strike], sudden framerate drops. I expected the devs will act fast like they did with [i]Shinovi Versus[/i] (they even add more quality of life settings!) but as [i]Bon Appetit![/i] it has been 2 weeks and I heard nothing from them.

For the same price as [i]Shinovi Versus[/i], I'd recommend SV for more actions and replayability. 

But who am I kidding? Nan Yaegashi's art style is my favorite and I support every single of his works even it's unlocalized. (see [i]Evenicle[/i])

BEST MUSIC:
[url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=upiREzvawlg ]Character Select Screen - Catch a Tigress by the Toe[/url]

author: {'steamid': '76561198037003719', 'num_games_owned': 4057, 'num_reviews': 385, 'playtime_forever': 124, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 124, 'last_played': 1479458604}
review:
日本忍者搭配爆量料理有沒有搞頭？以賣肉為主、動作為輔的動作格鬥遊戲《Senran Kagura》系列推出一款風格與以往截然不同的音樂節奏遊戲《Senran Kagura: Bon Appétit》，本以為只是純粹的音樂節奏遊戲，不過因應劇情需求，女主角『飛鳥』的爺爺『半藏』利用【可實現任何願望的忍法書】為誘因，吸引四所忍者學院的女學生參加自己舉辦的【爆量料理大賽】。這次的故事不再如同以往嚴肅，料理對決也不像忍術對決般危險（除了輸得一方還是會被未知力量爆衣爆到一絲不掛），難得能夠看到眾女角放下恩怨情仇，全心全意地專注在烹飪料理上，並且為全天下紳士呈獻名符其實的波濤洶湧豪華大餐！

先從故事模式介紹，被稱為最強忍者的半藏舉辦爆量料理大賽，優勝者的獎品是能夠實現任何願望的忍法書，總計二十二名的參賽者們為了實現自己的願望而報名參加，當玩家選擇完角色後，通過五場料理比賽便能成為大賽優勝者，第一、四、五的對手都是由劇情安排，其餘二、三是系統隨機選擇的。其實不用太嚴肅看待參賽者們的參賽理由，例如筆者本命夜櫻的參賽理由就很單純，只是想要給弟妹較好的生活環境，順便透過比賽增進自己廚藝；正義廚雪泉被灌輸『可愛既是正義！』的觀念後，就開始尋找可愛的定義，最後他發現善於料理的良妻賢母形象是最符合可愛的形象，於是便報名參加大賽。


遊戲玩法屬於普通的音樂節奏遊戲，當系統要求的指令抵達左下方飛鏢圖示時，按下指定按鈕即可累積畫面正上方的計量表，同時單場賽事分為三個階段，玩家如果在各階段都沒有失誤且獲得完全優勢，前兩階段試吃時間所獲得的半顆愛心會在最終階段變成完整的愛心。愛心會在曲子進入中段時出現，這時只要在正確時機點按下任意按鈕，對手因慘敗而露出的性感肉體將在玩家眼前嶄露無遺，持續保持優勢直到曲目結束，就可以欣賞到猶如電影《食神》般的誇張場景，評審半藏會被美味至極的爆量料理感動到大哭，大喊一聲『太好吃啦！』就把落敗者僅存的貼身衣物完全撕碎，最強忍者稱號果然名不虛傳！


令人感到惋惜的是，儘管本作在料理對決的演出十分精美，但也遮掩不了《Senran Kagura: Bon Appétit》收錄樂曲不夠動聽的事實，儘管與不同對手比賽時可以欣賞到曲調豐富的樂曲，其節奏也很符合角色獨有的個性，著實是讓玩過前作的系列作粉絲感到滿足。不過對於首次接觸《Senran Kagura》系列的新玩家來說，登場樂曲的力道不足以點燃玩家心中熱情，收錄曲目又大多是擷取前作動作格鬥遊戲的背景音樂進行改編，若不是對前作熟悉的玩家，實在是不太容易引起共鳴，更不用說是樂在其中的擊打節奏了。

無法連線對戰也是遺憾之處，既然是料理對決，為何不能跟其他玩家一較高下呢？明明有許多音樂節奏遊戲都有支援線上對戰模式，如果擔心樂曲難度一樣會造成玩家間勝負不夠精彩，那麼可以考慮加入【干擾】對手的忍術系統，如增加對方需要輸入的指令數量、暫時性遮掩視線、強制脫去衣物等，將遊戲內容拘限於單人遊玩，整體玩法變化性又不高，除非是對原作非常有愛的粉絲，不然通關兩三名角色的主線故事，疲倦感便會油然而生，畢竟玩法從頭到尾大同小異，驅使玩家繼續玩下去的誘因光靠歐派是不夠的！


《Senran Kagura: Bon Appétit》是款滿足紳士族群的優質歐派遊戲，故事時間點也與前作有所銜接，玩過前作的粉絲很容易就進入狀況，了解到人物之間的愛恨情仇，但將賣肉成分或前作相關內容去除，它就不再是一款適合所有人購買遊玩的作品，音樂節奏玩法中庸、料理方面演出有限、核心玩法變化性小、販售價格偏高，以上都是無法令人忽略的缺點。總而言之，這是對於針對特定族群製作的音樂節奏遊戲，如果對巨乳高中生和日本忍者這對組合有興趣，又不排斥點到為止的音樂節奏玩法，那麼或許可以考慮購買本作遊玩。


優點：
+ 22 名女忍者為了實現願望重拾廚具，大和撫子便是的日本女性最佳形象。
+參加料理大賽不只要贏，還要爭取到完全優勢，逼迫對方狼狽地脫光衣服。
+名作《食神》都要自嘆不如，半藏爺爺你也太有戲了吧！小當家評審上身？
+系列首部支援中文化作品，不要再擔心語文能力不足導致看不懂故事劇情。


缺點：
-音樂節奏玩法中規中矩且絲毫沒有亮點，通關故事模式後就很難提起興致。
-遊戲的對戰模式只是跟單一電腦對戰的Versus Mode，並非連線對戰模式。


結論：粉絲取向的歐派遊戲，可玩性以及耐玩度都比動作格鬥遊戲差上許多。


網誌圖文好讀版：
http://mgrim214.blogspot.tw/2016/11/senran-kagura-bon-appetit.html

author: {'steamid': '76561198063658610', 'num_games_owned': 1073, 'num_reviews': 150, 'playtime_forever': 925, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 271, 'last_played': 1503224664}
review:
おっぱい。
おっぱいと女体盛り。

高難易度でもちょっとの練習ですぐにできる程度で、リズムゲームとしてはかなり簡単な部類に入る。
モデルもテクスチャもちょっと悲しいクオリティで、シナリオはぶっちゃけ寒い。
今時3000円弱でできることが実質リズムゲームとショボいグラの着せ替えだけっていうのは確実に人を選ぶはず。
けどさ、おっぱい揺れるからいいじゃん。

素面で遊ぶにはちょっと厳しいものがあるかもしれないが、お酒片手にニヤニヤしながら遊ぶにはちょうどいいんじゃないかな。
酔ってても簡単だし。

author: {'steamid': '76561197988371092', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 45, 'playtime_forever': 1932, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 272, 'last_played': 1528391383}
review:
More Senran Kagura games? Yes, Please!!! Also supports 2560x1440 resolution. 
My gf and I really like these naughty, fan service games. I really dig these because they always have good music to go with the fighting( in this case cooking). 
This one is a rythm game so I would expect that unless you are good at rythm games, this will provide some challenge. 

I own all the 3ds and now pc entries for senran kagura. I hope they release Estival Vs. soon! 
These titles aren't for everyone and especially the repressed.  These are goofy and light hearted games at the core, that I find are pretty good to unwind to.

author: {'steamid': '76561197989557728', 'num_games_owned': 630, 'num_reviews': 110, 'playtime_forever': 163, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 161, 'last_played': 1479664928}
review:
He jugado 2h y creo que son suficientes para hacer un breve análisis del juego, puesto que el mismo es corto, y esto no quiere decir malo.

El juego de primeras, hay que tener en cuentan que pertenece a la "saga" senran kagura, por lo que vamos a tener desnudos muy gratuitos. Teniendo en cuenta, que hay diferentes juegos de Senran Kagura y son diferentes, vamos a analizar esto tal y como es, un juego rítmico de cocina.

Para analizar esto, simplemente diré que el juego entretiene un rato, no está mal, es gracioso y las canciones pegadizas. Tiene varios modos de juego, historia, arcade y libre. Cuenta con una serie de "desbloqueables" que van desde música, imagenes, voces a trajes y accesorios para nuestras "cocineras".

El juego tiene bastantes personajes con los que jugar y trajes para cambiar, todo por partes iguales... Una vez te pones a jugar es casi imposible desviar la mirada de lo que estamos pulsando (A menos que seamos unos pervertidos y nos mole mirar las tetas), haciendo del juego una buena experiencia en cuanto a su genero.

Os diré que no os dejéis engañar por la estética del juego, pues al igual que pasa con Gal*Gun: Double Peace, son buenos juegos con unas cuantas horas de duración, además este viene con todos los DLC, así que bueno... Lo unico malo que le veo es precio, algo "elevadillo" para lo que es el juego.


Os dejo un streaming de cerca de 2h que hice mostrando el juego y tal, como hago casi siempre con mis suscriptores :)

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SwPhu2umK5w


[b]Nota: 7.5/10[/b]

author: {'steamid': '76561198017475979', 'num_games_owned': 352, 'num_reviews': 36, 'playtime_forever': 182, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 152, 'last_played': 1489190967}
review:
SENRAN KAGURA: Bon Appétit! – Full Course è in grado di assicurare parecchie ore di divertimento anche grazie alla presenza di tutti i DLC rilasciati, a patto che siate amanti del genere e che vi piacciano i titoli che puntano tutto sul ritmo musicale, in cui il gameplay si riduce a premere correttamente dei tasti in sequenza per vincere le battaglie. Diversamente da ciò, è possibile sbizzarrirsi nella personalizzazione delle varie protagoniste per renderle ancora più sexy, ma a parte il soddisfacimento temporaneo delle fantasie maschili (e magari anche femminili, perché no) non pensiamo sia un elemento di gioco fondamentale in grado di intrattenere. Questo spin-off, comunque, rimane indirizzato principalmente ai fan della serie che, per qualche motivo, non hanno avuto modo di giocare il titolo originale su PS Vita o che vogliono semplicemente vedere le prosperose forme delle shinobi in alta definizione e in un contesto culinario.

Recensione completa: [url=http://www.4news.it/26518-recensione-senran-kagura-bon-appetit-full-course.html] SENRAN KAGURA: Bon Appétit! - Full Course	[/url]

author: {'steamid': '76561198276383313', 'num_games_owned': 2410, 'num_reviews': 214, 'playtime_forever': 2141, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2141, 'last_played': 1479580219}
review:
如果你買來是為了FANSERVICE。這個遊戲就適合你。
但對我來說，這個遊戲有很不尋常的GLITCH。背景會變黑，令人無法忍受。用XBOX360的CONTROLER很不適合玩應為仿向鍵盤會按錯所以你只能用PS4的CONTROLER會比姣好。

author: {'steamid': '76561198036316241', 'num_games_owned': 660, 'num_reviews': 292, 'playtime_forever': 291, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7, 'last_played': 1481423546}
review:
섬란 카구라 시리즈인 시노비 벗ㅓ스의 외전 작품 섬란 카구라 : 보나뻬티입니다. (많이 섭취하라는 프랑스어 접대용 인사. 국내 정발명은 데카모리 섬란 카구라입니다.)

히토미를 돌아다니다보면 가끔씩 볼 수 있는 맛있는 여캐들이 귀여운 음식을 만들어서 요리 대결을 펼친다는 단순한 스토리를 다룬 외전 게임이며 기본적으로는 평범한 리듬게임의 구성을 취한 듯 하지만 이런 게임이 항상 그렇듯이 대결이 고조되었을 때 여캐들이 마치 전성기의 헐크 호건을 보는 것처럼 자신의 옷을 찢어버리는 장면을 주 컨텐츠로 내세운 게임입니다.

공식적으로 한글이 지원되는 장점이 있고 컨텐츠가 괜찮아보이는 듯한 게임이지만 게임이 다소 단순한 구성으로 반복되는데다가 무엇보다 플레이어들이 한 손으로만 플레이할수밖에 없는 소재를 삼고서도 리듬액션 장르 특성상 양손 플레이를 강제하면서 심각한 몰입감 및 감정이입 저하의 단점이 발생하기에 흘러간 황제 헐크 호건의 팬이 아니라면 정가에 살만한 게임은 아니라고 생각됩니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198003771261', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 81, 'playtime_forever': 1874, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1305, 'last_played': 1521082938}
review:
As usual, xSeed gives us another fantastic port.
1080p, 60fps, sees DS4 controller and has key binding, uncensored (in true sense of word, aka there is no nudity, but nothing is removed/changed from the Japanese version).
Music is nice, you've got about 20+ tracks.
Difficulty is... well, let's face it, it's not "Through the fire and flames" on Expert, but it still can be chalenging and if anything, I find it a bit too chaotic. What I mean by that is - there are two tracks with moving buttons. But you never know if the next "X" will show up on top or bottom. And same goes for every button. I would definitely prefer if, say, top bar was for arrows and bottom - for buttons, but alas... it's really confusing, chaotic and somewhat irritating.
But other than that, I love this game. And if anything, it's worth the purchase to show our support for a good uncensored port.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970704819', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 337, 'playtime_forever': 1250, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 297, 'last_played': 1659435974}
review:
[h1]เซอร์วิสพิเศษที่นำเสนอในรูปแบบของศึกประลองการทำอาหาร![/h1]

SENRAN KAGURA Bon Appetit! พาเหล่านินจาสาวจาก 3 โรงเรียนกลับมาประชันฝีมือกันอีกครั้ง แต่ครั้งนี้ไม่ได้ดวลกันด้วยเพลงหมัดและวิชานินจา แต่กลายเป็นการเข้าครัวสะบัดกระทะและวาดลวดลายการทำอาหารแทนครับ ตัวเกมบน PC เป็นงานพอร์ตจาก PSVita (2014) ที่ทำออกมาได้ค่อนข้างดีเช่นเดียวกับเกมภาคก่อน เฟรมเรทวิ่งกันสูงสุดที่ 60 fps กราฟิกต่างๆ คมชัดมากขึ้น แม้ตัวเลือกกราฟิกจะมีให้ปรับไม่มากนักแต่งานศิลป์ก็ส่งให้เกมดูดีตามแบบฉบับอนิเมะซีรีส์ SENRAN KAGURA เหมือนอย่างเคย

เกมเพลย์ภาคนี้ไม่มีการมารัวปุ่มซัดกันแบบเกมต่อสู้อีกแล้ว การดวลกันในการทำอาหารของแต่ละตัวละครคือการกดปุ่มให้เข้ากับจังหวะเพลงตามที่เกมนำเสนอ หากคุณกดปุ่มได้ตรงและถูกต้องไปเรื่อยๆ ลีลาการทำอาหารของสาวน้อยนินจาแต่ละคนก็จะเริ่มอลังการงานสร้างขึ้นเรื่อยๆ ทั้งยังป็นการสะสมคอมโบเพื่อสรุปคะแนนการทำอาหารในตอนสุดท้ายของการดวลด้วย แน่นอนว่าเกมซีรีส์นี้เน้นขายความวาบหวิวเป็นเซอร์วิสพิเศษ การพิชิตคู่ต่อสู้ในการดวลทำอาหารแต่ละรอบก็จะมีเอฟเฟคทำให้เสื้อผ้าของคุณเธอขาดรุ่งริ่งเช่นเดิม และถ้าคุณสามารถจบการดวลได้ด้วยคะแนนแบบ Perfect ตัวเกมก็จะมีฉากเซอร์วิสพิเศษของตัวละครที่คุณพิชิตให้คุณได้ชมด้วย ทั้งหมดนี่เรียกว่าทำมาเพื่อเอาใจแฟนเกมซีรีส์นี้โดยเฉพาะเลย

แต่หากมองในมุมของนักเล่นทั่วไปที่ไม่ได้สนใจเรื่องเซอร์วิสเป็นหลัก เกมภาคนี้ทำมาได้ค่อนข้างน่าผิดหวังในบางจุด อาทิ ไม่ว่าคุณจะเลือกตัวละครไหนมาเล่นเกมเพลย์ก็จะเหมือนกันหมด ไม่มีเอกลักษณ์พิเศษเหมือนเกมภาคอื่นของซีรีส์ การเล่นไม่มีอะไรแตกต่างกัน คุณแค่ต้องกดปุ่มให้ตรงกับทำนองเพลงตามที่เกมระบุมาแค่นั้น แม้กระทั่งการใช้ท่าพิเศษเร่งทำคะแนนตลอดจนอนิเมชั่นการทำอาหารที่มีการปล่อยพลังรัวมีดหรือสะบัดกระทะจนออร่าเปล่งประกาย จุดนี้เหมือนกันหมดครับแค่เปลี่ยนโมเดลตัวละครมายืนในฉากเท่านั้นเอง ด้านความท้าทายของตัวเกมผมคงพูดได้ว่านี่เป็นอีกเกมทีทำมาให้คุณแข่งกับตัวเองเป็นหลัก เพราะระดับความยากที่สูงขึ้นปุ่มที่คุณต้องกดให้ตรงในแต่ละเพลงก็จะมากขึ้นตามไปด้วย จุดนี้ถ้าคุณตาดี มือไว และมีสมาธิในการเล่น ความท้าทายแทบจะหมดไปในทันทีเลย AI ในเกมนี้ไม่มีผลอะไรกับการเล่น และสุดท้ายที่น่าเสียดายคือเกมนี้มีอนิเมชั่นตอนทำอาหารเจ๋งๆให้ดูเรื่อยๆ แต่ตลอดการเล่นคุณแทบจะไม่ได้ละสายตาจากลำดับการกดปุ่มเลย การวาดลวดลายของเหล่าสาวน้อยนินจาตอนทำอาหารเลยอาจกลายเป็นสิ่งที่ทำให้คุณเสียสมาธิในการเล่นแทนซะอย่างงั้น 

แม้เกมเพลย์จะไม่มีอะไรลึกหรือหลากหลายแต่การเล่นรวมๆก็สนุกดี เหมาะกับการใช้จอยเล่นเป็นที่สุด เพลงประกอบทำมาได้อย่างน่าสนใจและเหมาะสำหรับใครก็ตามที่กำลังมองหาเกมแนวกดปุ่มเข้าจังหวะมาเล่นเพลินๆ (รวมถึงแฟนซีรีส์นี้ด้วย) อย่างไรก็ดีเนื่องจากมันไม่ใช่เกมใหม่สดซิงที่พึ่งออกวางขาย แต่เป็นการพอร์ตเกมเก่าเอามาเล่าใหม่บน PC ราคาเริ่มต้นจึงอาจจะแพงไปซักนิด แนะนำว่ากดตอนมันลดครึ่งราคาจะเหมาะสมที่สุดครับ

author: {'steamid': '76561198071540153', 'num_games_owned': 338, 'num_reviews': 207, 'playtime_forever': 1286, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1286, 'last_played': 1479552353}
review:
身为奶子控，第一时间就入手了。之前就有看到过忍乳负重，但不知竟然是个音游。画面相较SV变得更加清晰了，妹子更养眼了，最让我有直观感受的就是妹子们的表情变的更加丰富了，食物做的也挺有食欲的，但画面的长进也只限于此了，内衣场景什么的怎么还是如此粗糙啊，各种马赛克内衣。我这也是第一次接触音游，直接被普通难度给扒了个精光，果断简单难度走起。但既然作为一个音游就20多首曲子？而且大多数都很难听啊！前作SV的BGM很出色，为什么不用呢，非要用难听的角色歌和原创曲。因为玩的简单难度，音符节奏有点简单，跟歌曲节奏好像不是很匹配，不过按着还是挺爽的。
对奶子有执着或者闪乱粉肯定要入的，如果只是一般玩家，等75off吧，毕竟这不是个能玩很长时间的游戏。为了能看到明年EV也登录PC，还是点个赞吧。

author: {'steamid': '76561197980429671', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 69, 'playtime_forever': 110, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 110, 'last_played': 1478964609}
review:
It normally takes me longer to form opinions about a game, but this one is upfront about what it is and a playthrough on a single path can tell you all you need to know.  I grabbed it because I generally enjoy rhythm games and this sat on the top of the charts for a bit, I was also surprised and shocked at how much I enjoyed the previous beat-em-up from the same franchise.  My opinion of this one is a little more tepid.  I sat for a while wondering what it is about this game I don't like but other rhythm games have and in short-it's the funk and soul I see in the others I don't see here.

First, the rhythm portion uses controller button presses to manage beats in time with a song.  If you've played any rhythm game since amplitude, the controls are immediately familiar.  The taps fall in time with the song playing in the background and the gameplay is familiar, if copied, from previous generations.  Not necessarilly a bad thing.

The songs however, are mostly jpop even when the tracks try to switch to a different genre the jpop remains familiar in the background.  This is a preference thing, you may enjoy jpop a lot, I like japanese folk music more and that will tell you how aged my preferences in japanese music are.

What is happening is well, anime girls with big gainax boobies take a break from beating each other up to competing in a cooking competition.  Some strange old guy judges.  His reactions to the winning dish can include, at its most extreme, growing a large pair of big gainax anime boobies himself.  He then blasts the clothing off of the losing contestant with his mouth laser.  It sounds like a twisted mix which came out of Japanese games like D4: Dark Dreams Don't Die.  Incedentally, it comes off as being just strange and not strange and amusing.

The combination of cooking, titilation, and rhythm comes off as a bit off-putting and unusual as in it probably doesn't work well together.  It's like if that old Stephen Chow flick "God of Cookery" got mixed together with jpop and anime boobies, it sounds wierd enough to be enjoyable but something seems a bit off.

I like rhythm games enough to open it and slog through a bit more every now and again but even with what's available on steam, there are better alternatives and maybe this one should be passed.

author: {'steamid': '76561198124273893', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 481, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 231, 'last_played': 1620590124}
review:
Всем здрасте! Я бы хотел поделиться с вами моим мнением об этой части игры. Я играл в Senran Kagura Burst, Senran Kagura 2: Deep Crimson, Senran Kagura Shinovi Versus и наконец поиграл в Dekomori Senran Kagura (Bon Appetit).

Тут есть так и плюсы, так и минусы.
+ПЛЮСЫ+
*Отличный саундтрек.
*Интересный геймплей.
*Хороший ритм.
*Забавные сюжетные истории.
*Можно играть как на геймпаде, так и на клаве.
*Учитель Кирия ломает четвёртую стену перед первым поединком в каждой сюжетке на подобии "Аска персонаж Senran Kagura! Вокруг неё всё и крутится!".
*Вызывающие "десерты" при идеальной победе.
*Есть Arcade mode где можно перепройти историю не читая диалогов вообще, так же есть Free mode в котором можно сразиться с кем угодно и за кого хочешь (К примеру понравилась песня у кого-то, уже знаешь против кого будет кулинарное сражение!).
*Йоми сильно любит шпроты.
*Аска любит пихать в каждый рот большой и твёрдый... Футомаки Ролл!
*Прописаны персонажи при близости к их заветной мечте, их жадности, стремление к "улучшению" мира.

-МИНУСЫ-
*У меня есть подвисания, помогает только перезагрузка ПК, и то, только на 30-40 минут, при включённом браузере или при записи тормозит невозможно, а это ритм игра. В итоге музыка идёт, а изображение не хочет, получаеться так что музыка идёт вперёд, далеко далеко вперёд, из-за чего ритм никакой (Буду ждать фиксов, и если что я не так давно очищал ПК от вирусов).
*Мало настроек графики, а что можно было ожидать от порта с Виты? Даже у той же Нептунии было мало настроек, и всё норм.
*Есть Китайский,Японский и Английский язык, но нет Русского (хотя это не такая большая проблема, особенно для меня. Играю в ту же Persona или Shin Megami Tensei без каких либо проблем с переводом, да, я не могу переводить какие-то мелкие детали, но это не мешает наслаждаться играми, тем более максимум на английском языке)

Ну а так мне игра очень даже понравилась. В скоре ещё выйдет шутер 16 марта следующего года, но пока-что только в Японии. Ну и буду ожидать порта Senran Kagura Estival Versus именно с PS4 (OneChanBara Z2: Chaos портировали же с PS4) С:
Правда меня огорчил первый пункт из минусов :с Но как-нибудь потерплю...

Только из-за первого пункта из минусов я не могу советовать эту часть ВСЕМ, я бы посоветовал ту же Shinovi Versus если на ПК или вите. Ну или же есть 3DS то сразу 2 части, ибо вторая на прямую связана с первой сюжетом. В аниме даже не всё сказали, а именно те ключевые события.

Я бы поставил игре 5\5. Так ставлю 3\5 из-за того что у меня проблема с игрой которая мешает наслаждаться ей. Не факт что у вас будет такая же проблема. Причём есть сохранялки после каждого боя.

Спасибо всем кто прочитал!

author: {'steamid': '76561198020125851', 'num_games_owned': 15680, 'num_reviews': 840, 'playtime_forever': 327, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 314, 'last_played': 1524131445}
review:
[h1]An Ecchi Rhythm Cooking Game[/h1]
https://youtu.be/JQW_Ak3cY8A
+ This game is loads of fun. The is a rhythm game where you time inputs with the music while two Anime babes cook in the background in a Master Chef-like competition of culinary warfare.
+ Very ecchi or sexually playful outfits. Each time you win a round pieces of the opposing girls outfit gets ripped off until they are completely nude. If you are skillful enough you can even earn a "Heart" which will unlock a very sexy bonus scene.
+ Visually the game looks amazing! Very bright and colorful with super cute sexy anime babes.
+ Great japanese voice-overs for all the dialogue which brings the characters to life.
+ Fantastic Japanese soundtrack filled with great variety
+ The intro anime cutscene put a huge smile on my face and is just filled with joy :D
+ Loads of characters to choose from
+ You can customize every character with a huge selection of outfits
+ Challenging yet very rewarding as you continue to improve and comes with a great deal of replayability if you are willing to try your luck on Hard mode.

- Very few breaks in each song which prevents you from being able to enjoy watching the girls cook in the background as you must be laser focused on the relentless amount of inputs. (Honestly, this game may be more enjoyable to watch)
- There's 3 rounds in each cook-off, but it seems the only round that actually matters is the third round. I found this to be a bit unfair at times when the enemy dominates the third round.

author: {'steamid': '76561197962082784', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 493, 'playtime_forever': 19, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 19, 'last_played': 1478885104}
review:
The port is fine. Impressions below based off the Vita version.

It's a rhythm game, and I daresay it's better at being a rhythm game than every other Senran Kagura game is at beating a fighting game. The songs are all essentially the same sorts of energetic, bouncy video game music tracks you had in SKSV's strong soundtrack, so if you're expecting to get some Hatsune Miku variety you will be disappointed. Each girl has their own song, so which song you play is decided by the opponent you pick. If you are clearing story modes, this means you will be repeating songs by necessity.

But the fundamentals are strong. The dopey Senran stories from SKSV are ramped up to 10 in ridiculousness here. If you wanted to know what lay ahead for Yumi after she learned what justice truly was in SKSV, this is surely your game. 

Naturally, the dressing room, clothes getting blasted off, and the bounciness you have come to expect from SK is all still here.

Fair warning: Hard is pretty hard and even ignoring the distractions up above, the note track isn't the easiest to read. Also Daidoji and Rin's songs are about twice as hard as anyone else's so if you rush straight for them be wary.

author: {'steamid': '76561198092555512', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 190, 'playtime_forever': 146, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 146, 'last_played': 1478871949}
review:
闪乱神乐？买买买 [spoiler] marvy酱的游戏 大家都懂[/spoiler]

  表面上是个音乐游戏，到了我这种萌豚手残手上就变成了哲学游戏。[spoiler] 有道是，球与全连，不可兼得。[/spoiler]
拿到一整颗心（前两阶段获胜后）会有一个音符变成一颗心，然后。。我就断连了
开游戏时扫了一眼提示，第一次打出三场全胜看到额外奖励还是把我震了一下 [spoiler]圣光就算了，水果冰淇淋和奶油什么的。。 [/spoiler]

游戏性？四个字，文明观球。有球什么都好说。仍然具备音乐游戏的基本素养，外带在线排名，三个游戏模式也非常贴心
内容还是蛮有诚意的，二十多个角色每人一首bgm；更衣室初始十几套衣服；每打一场还在不断的掉衣服和饰品，换好衣服还能穿去动画和立绘（3D模型）里；通了葛城线，语音包一套开出来有两百多语音，不知道其他角色如何。以小学挂科数学算了一下故事模式全通起码100场，有得玩了。。[spoiler]剧情是什么好吃吗？ [/spoiler]

1111/10 不买不是人

[spoiler]哦，还有冰淇淋打出来后在更衣室里用Q或者E看，游戏里没有这个键位提示[/spoiler]
