author: {'steamid': '76561198253263673', 'num_games_owned': 232, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 668, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 503, 'last_played': 1568163395}
review:
前作玩了37个小时，我只想说，诸君，我渴望奶子，误，欧派。
所以闪乱神乐：忍乳负重刚出我就迫不及待地入了。

双11是一个对单身狗并不友好的日子，
而我愿意用我的手速拥有这欧派。
什么？手速不行？
那就简单的呗。

一样的画风，不一样的体验。
相比于前作的动作类无脑刷刷刷，
再也不用憋自爆看全裸了。
而且combo多的话还有特写哦，prprprpr。
最后的女体宴，欸嘿嘿，奶油巧克力。
还有更衣室，我能玩一年，居然还有那个无节操的成就。- -

不过相比于前作，本作还是很考验手速的。
不，一定不是我撸多了，我还能再战！
什么，居然又被爆了，美食评分那么低？
一定是我还没熟悉这种音乐打击感→ →

↑↓←→，wasd，就这么几个按键，我要用我的双手成就我的梦想（欧派）。

而且还自带繁中哦，刚出就10%还等什么呢


不过，这要打多久啊，三个难度。
目前连简单都没打完的手残党路过。

author: {'steamid': '76561198100678188', 'num_games_owned': 193, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 1980, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 814, 'last_played': 1480565140}
review:
奶子时间又到辣！

作为一个支线作品，这作相较SV的进步实在太大辣！
2K分辨率的奶子赛高辣！
并且这部作品真的是诚意满满，
各种注意到非常棒的小细节和分镜，
还有成吨的CG和服装[spoiler]气球大法好[/spoiler]发放，
音乐的质量也相当不错，
还有游戏过程中随机出现的鉴赏视角，
而且还有中文！
还有中文！
还有中文！
重要的事情说三遍[strike]虽然我会日语[/strike]。
（另外这个中文翻译有点奇怪吖，各种老子老娘满天飞）

然而作为一个游戏音乐数量有点少略微有点硬伤，
作为移植作品BUG也有些多，成就也需要退出游戏才能跳出来，
此外本作的难度也不是很高[strike]如果窝看个奶子比登天还难这游戏你还想不想卖了喂！[/strike]
不过看个奶子废话辣么多干啥！

啥也不说辣，
飛鳥、[spoiler]为了又粗又大的东西[/spoiler]舞え忍びます！
窝先去品尝人体拼盘辣！

author: {'steamid': '76561198087451020', 'num_games_owned': 2281, 'num_reviews': 131, 'playtime_forever': 733, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 684, 'last_played': 1620375761}
review:
小小的福利：
[spoiler]在选择游戏模式的界面，Q+E按住不放，快速连打WADSWDASWDSAWWASDW即可解锁所有服装[/spoiler]


奶子一如既往的大！

官中必须要好评！（我看到了“欧派”这个词）

爆衣系统让我做菜充满了动力！（能爆三层，不过有圣光，什么都看不到）

高分之后有裁判特写（就像《食神》里面薛佳燕在黯然销魂饭上面翻滚一样）和对手特写（女体盛，不过关键部位都用奶油、酱汁等覆盖，啥也看不到）

难度略高（相对于我之前玩的太鼓达人来说，大学玩了4年太鼓达人，却被这游戏的普通难度虐哭，当然键盘没小P好操作也是一方面）

剧情？要啥剧情？我们要的是奶子！哦，不，是欧派！

PS：这游戏用多核CPU电脑玩有BUG，要是进游戏发现画面卡住不动，请在任务管理器里把游戏主程序设成单核运行，即可正常游戏

------------------------------------------------------------------------
玩了一会还发现一个问题，游戏里达成的成就不是即时显示，而是在退出游戏的时候一起显示，达成时间一律是退出游戏的时间，这就导致该游戏的成就像是用SAM刷的一样，略不爽

------------------------------------------------------------------------
一打开排行榜就停止工作

author: {'steamid': '76561198059286918', 'num_games_owned': 1004, 'num_reviews': 992, 'playtime_forever': 745, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 129, 'last_played': 1480642199}
review:
Итак у нас продолжение сенран кагуры-не геемплейное но прямое как рельса.
Итак у нас тут ритм игра-тоесть нажимаем кнопочки в ряд в нужное время,но в мире сенран кагуры-тоесть все персонажи,музыка,шмотки перенесены с прошлой сенран кагуры и все тут до боли знакомо. 
Что нового (ну  кроме еще +   костюмов) своя сюжетка-которая построена наааааааааааааааа
КУЛИНАРНОМ Батле между участницами,только вместо зачитывания речетатива-приготовления нямки,и да если вы уделали   соперницу 3 раза с 3 в конце раунда получите  18+ сценку.
Тоесть это неплохой спин офф по сенран кагуре который затащит вас часов на 20-30.
Брать ли всем?Врядли,игра на любителя.
Брать ли любителям аниме и оголенки? Возможно но со скидосом больше 50% точно брать.
Брать ли фанатам сенран кагуры,мюзик ритмов и любителям неплохих портов с виты-да, я брал в день релиза-не жалею не капли.

author: {'steamid': '76561198274465207', 'num_games_owned': 34, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 231, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 90, 'last_played': 1493580924}
review:
If you love Senran Kagura and Rhythm games like I do this is probably for you!
Now I see alot of reviews below saying this is "easy" its really not unless you dedicate your time and practice on Osu! or some other outrageous rhythm game. It takes a bit to get used too especially when you can't use a steam controller. The only thing the controller can actually do is move over menu options so get used to the keyboard.... (If there is some way to use the controller for more go ahead and correct me I'd appreciate it) 

Besides my few gripes with the controls the graphics are just as nice as even a bit better than game previously released on steam, SK ES. Although I have a few personal problems, Green screen when the intro plays, I hear the music fine. And sometimes the backgrounds black out or spaz a bit in the background the characters manage to be perfectly fine along with the Hanzo scenes.

I don't hate the game for these small problems since its a learning experience. Its a funny out there game with nice songs by the seiyuu of my favorite characters. Plus the specials are all worth it. ;)

author: {'steamid': '76561197990658847', 'num_games_owned': 2407, 'num_reviews': 51, 'playtime_forever': 351, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 281, 'last_played': 1481517442}

author: {'steamid': '76561197971732795', 'num_games_owned': 565, 'num_reviews': 137, 'playtime_forever': 259, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 204, 'last_played': 1478776964}
review:
Senran Kagura Bon Appetit is pure fan service, there’s no getting away from that but if you suck at rhythm games then you’re out of luck although you can still have some fun playing on the easy mode. The only real criticisms levelled at this game is a lack of recognizable tunes (if you’re not Japanese) and the fact the art design could have used a few more effects to give the characters more colour depth. Other than that the game does what it says on the tin.

Senran Kagura Bon Appetit seems like it’s designed purely to view the ladies in a variety of cooking scenarios which make their well endowed chests heave and wobble as much as possible. It’s almost as if it’s an anime fetish game especially with the sauce covered ladies in their special scenes as rewards. Still, if you’re a fan of ogling anime characters then this one is highly suggestive even if it’s tame compared to more racy adult content available. If you’re into the franchise then this is very much a fun distraction and if you’re not and want to sample some Japanese cultural differences then you can get that here in spades. Anyone else, especially those of a sensitive nature need to look away…forever lest they taint their vision with over-sexualized young ladies in provocative scenes designed purely to titillate in a fun kind of way.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gL-7V7u4qfA

author: {'steamid': '76561198010303078', 'num_games_owned': 748, 'num_reviews': 109, 'playtime_forever': 201, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 197, 'last_played': 1483838581}
review:
This game is still a Vita port, so if you're expecting some PS4 level remaster, you're not getting it for the right reasons.

The game is fairly simple in its controls, loaded with fanservice, and has a story that isn't so much of a story as it is the "Girl's missions" for the other games padded by a ryhthm minigame that goes from "So easy grandma can do it" to "I bet Korean Starcraft II tournaments are easier than this."

The game has an unlockable/outfit system which you can use and abuse to your libido's limits that works by beating various characters, and story modes to unlock items you can use in the dressing room. On top of that, between each challenge, you can hit the dresisng room immediately to put those cat ears on your ninja of choice.

I think the game, personally, is a bit up there in fanservice. It gets really hard to hit the right buttons when giant breasts pop up and take command of the scene, but other than that. If you're into that, great. I got it mostly to know more about Senran Kagura story (lol [no really, I like the ninjas and all but knowing more about a character is plain fun ] ) and sharpen up my rythym skills so I can play other games like STepmania and Crypt of the Necrodancer a bit easier. It seems like a promising way to get better at those as well.

tl;dr : It's a titty comedy. Ask your junk how badly it wants this game, because it's probably going to get its money's worth.

review:
Played this game quite a bit on the vita to kill time!
This port was done very well! i am finally able to play on a bigger screen without the frame drops of the vita tv!
it isnt anything crazy as far as a rythm game goes but it is fun and a good chuckle!

review:
Oppai is world language, brings love and peace.

故事介紹：
半藏商店街舉辦了美食大賽
第一名將獲得可以實現任何願望的忍法卷軸
波濤洶湧的美食決鬥(其實是音樂遊戲)就此展開
評審是半藏,當他吃到好吃的東西的時候
會出現不下於小當家暗黑料理界LED美食的反應
 司儀是假面K霧夜老師, 雖然他戴了假面大家都知道是誰

遊戲介紹：
告子曰「食色、性也」
人類的基本食慾 性慾 
還有STEAM上面的購買慾
只要你買了此款遊戲就跟出奇蛋一樣
三個願望一次滿足

SENRAN KAGURA Bon Appétit! - Full Course
Bon Appétit是法文 Bon是好以及Appétit是食慾
故合起來就是祝您好胃口的意思

評分：
有中文/日文/韓文/英文介面
DLC含角色全部贈送
這麼佛你要去哪找
810/10

密技：
在選單畫面中按住LR並輸入↑←→↓↑→←↓↑→↓←↑↑←↓→↑
可以直接拿到全內褲成就
enjoy it.
